the Caribbean". A place so cool that famed producer of The Beatles, Sir
George Martin, built a state-of-the-art recording complex there in 1976 where
the likes of Sir Paul McCartney, The Police, and Sir Elton John recorded
multi-platinum albums.Fast-forward to present-day, post-volcano Montserrat. ...Imagine a place so quiet that you can actually hear yourself breathe. With virtually no large hotels or resorts, Montserrat is off the beaten path and you will feel like a sixteenth century explorer discovering a new land. Witness first-hand the utter devastation of the Volcano on Montserrat's capital of Plymouth, now a modern-day Pompeii. 
The Island is an enchanting place,
its charm endearing. The people of Montserrat are genuinely warm; it's the kind
of place where people wave at each other on the roads and are never in too much
of a hurry to get anywhere. A British-Crown Colony, the Island is a safe travel
destination and a haven for retirees from North America & the U.K.
Montserrat boasts sublime spring water from the tap, a balmy year-round
climate, and stunning natural beauty.
Carrll & Gary Robilotta are
brothers who moved to the Caribbean Island of Montserrat in 1980 where they
pioneered the sport of surfing. After going through two natural disasters on
the Island (Hurricane Hugo in 1989 and then the eruption of the Soufriere Hills
Volcano in 1995), the brothers are now in the process of restoring/transforming
their long-time family home into an adventure tour destination/accommodation company. 
The Montserrat Island Adventure
Villa will be a one-of-a-kind accommodation in Montserrat. With your help, we
will create a fully-outfitted villa which will provide crowd-weary adventurers
with a great opportunity to explore this beautiful island, meet and interact with its wonderful people, and unplug from the frantic pace of life most of the world lives in. As a contributor, you will
enjoy some great discounts when you book your one, two, or three week adventures with us! 
Catering to single families,
couples, and small groups, our all-inclusive offering will include deluxe villa
accommodations, guided kayak, stand-up paddleboarding, electric mountain bike excursions, and off-road motorcycling.
Avid watermen and outdoorsmen, the Brothers Robilotta will be your hosts &
guides during your time on magical Montserrat. Best of all, pricing for our
all-inclusive adventure packages will be affordable--costing less what most hotels
charge for accommodations alone. 
Carrll & Gary will be
alternating as host & guides for their Montserrat Adventure Tours, meeting
their guests on the Island and personally overseeing every aspect of each
week-long adventure, ensuring an unforgettable experience!What We Need & What You Get
Our goal with this IndieGoGo
campaign is to raise $80,000.00 which is the amount we project which will be
needed to completely refurbish, refurnish, and outfit our villa. The funds will
go towards re-roofing & re-flooring, installing new cabinets, counter tops,
and vanities. The house will also be refurnished; nothing extravagant, but
just so that it is comfortable. In order to transform it into the type of
adventure destination we envision.We're offering some pretty cool perks for our contributors. It should be noted that while we have a 'delivery date' of October 2017 for our perks, the CD and art will be shipped out to contributors right away. The discount vouchers we are offering for our Montserrat Adventures will be delivered and valid once we achieve our funding goal and the house is refurbished. Alternatively, discount vouchers can also be used for our Adventure packages as outlined on our website: www.MontserratIslandAdventures.com. [Through a special arrangement with a select group of Montserrat villa owners, we are able to launch our Montserrat Adventure tours while we raise the necessary funding to refurbish our home. Our Adventure tours are launching in July of 2017].The Impact
All funds received through this
campaign will go towards refurbishing our house and attaining our goal of
giving it a new chapter: The Montserrat Island Adventure Villa! ...Much like
the proverbial phoenix rising from the ashes, our vision is to see our former
family home transformed into a unique adventure destination villa! [All
contribution funds will be deposited into an account specifically-designated to
refurbish/transform the Montserrat house].
Our campaign is important to us
because it is the only house we own as a family and it was dad's dying wish
that we never part with it. ...We have a wealth of sentimental value invested
in Montserrat and the house is in dire need of refurbishing. Achieving our goal
would enable us to share the allure of Montserrat like never before, with like-minded adventure
travelers.
The magnitude of your contribution,
large or small, is something we are sincerely grateful for! Please be sure to
read about the great perks we are offering contributors!
We'd like to sincerely thank you for
taking the time to read about our campaign. Even if you're not in a position to
contribute at this time, please share our campaign with friends or
acquaintances of yours who may be interested in exploring a wonderful Island
known for its friendly people, warm smiles, and unique character.
Please feel free to email us with
your questions or comments at the email address below.
Thanks again!
Carrll & Gary Robilotta
knpmaui@yahoo.com

story:
With big dreams and a small budget, often times a collaborative effort is necessary.  An environment where everyone pulls together their resources to make one fully functioning machine of talent is the best way to make your dreams come true.  It just so happens our company Hoshana Management Group does just that.  If everyone pulls together and we can raise funding, I know this can be a success! 

So what is Hoshana Management Group?

We are a husband and wife team that runs a company that helps local non-profits.  We started out just helping the local non-profits in the community, and decided to turn it into a business to help low-income communities as a whole. Because of the success we were having with our current non-profit partners, we decided to set up a membership website where our corporate members donate to our non-profit partners continuously, thus fulfilling their need of Corporate Social Responsibility... and most importantly, giving our NPO partners access to funding when ever they needed it.  We are dedicated to transforming low-income communities into thriving places.  We both have an insatiable passion to help change the lives of those who need it most. HMG Connects, would you like to help us on this mission?

Join the Connection!

Hello, my name is Danavan Hylton and I am here to tell you about Hoshana Management Group launching our first program campaign called The Conex-zone.  We developed this program in order to connect for-profit companies with non-profit companies.  Corporations and companies want to donate profits to charities and local funding but sometimes they don’t know where to send the money where it will have the highest impact on the community in which they serve.  We act as a platform to connect the funding with the cause.  We think it will help people in need of a solution for finding funding in these tough economic times.  We are dedicated to our non-profits and finding sustainable solutions for our community.

Do you ever think about giving back but don’t know where to do it?

Do you want to see local charities and non-profits but don’t know how?

Are you interested in connecting with an organization but don’t have the time?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…


Overview

Our popular culture reinforces the idea that getting funding can be one of the most difficult things an organization can go through. We're out to change that fallacious idea one client at a time! Help us establish this initiative to serve people in need of a solution. As little as $5 gets an organization a little closer to their goals and can change their ideas about what they can accomplish for the rest of their life.  Finding out your dreams can come true with ease will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!

More about the Project

2.25% of non-profits take in 99.5% of all funds.  Meaning there is a serious disconnect between corporate funding.– This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “Conex-zone” and all the possible benefits we could bring to people:

·  Set up a membership website where our corporate members donate to our non-profit partners

·  Corporate members can fulfill their need of Corporate Social Responsibility and make their way into the community

·  Small causes may find large support

When reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a business that needs to be created. We feel if executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to find funding.  Our features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the industry. Our mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the upmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our growth.

About Us

Hoshana Management Group is a professional networking service that builds deep-rooted markets for small businesses, government agencies, community organizations, and investors to improve low-income communities. Our approach is relationship building and management through the sharing of information and services among individuals and groups with a common interest. Our programs address solutions in areas such as fundraising, marketing and communications, staffing, community engagement and nonprofit development. The company currently focuses on the north Nashville and Madison, TN markets.

HMG is dedicated to providing solutions to community leaders, businesses and government agencies that serve low-income communities to transform distressed communities into healthy, peaceful, progressing environments. Not only can you retain the expert insight of diverse business consultants that serve diverse communities, but HMG can design a customized grassroots marketing campaign that will enhance your brand and performance in low-income and minority communities. The success of small businesses and community engagement helps fight the war on poverty, and plays a vital role in the decrease of crime. Small business success and public co-operation is why Hoshana Management Group exists.

Small businesses have always been the backbone of America. Today, fully one half of all workers in the private sector are employed by the nation’s twenty-two million small businesses. Corporations, partnerships, and sole proprietors of every size and importance generate half of our country’s gross domestic product and pay $1.5 trillion in payroll. As an advocate of small business, HMG takes pride in re-energizing complacent communities to ensure the businesses of today have every available resource to reach new heights.


Who do we work with?

·  Publicly owned corporations

·  Private Corporation

·  Charitable organizations or NGO

·  Federal, provincial/state or municipal government agencies

·  University or college


How You Can Help

For us to bring the “Conex-zone" to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development and our company needs a professional solicitation license to raise funds for non profits as our company will be considered a 3rd party fundraising company. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “Conex-zone” platform.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to:

·  Expand the possibilities for the usage for corporations as well as enterprise solutions of the “Conex”

·  Further customize the first version of the “Conex-zone” platform and website

·  Create additional fundraising services that will compliment the purpose of “Conex-zone”

Conex-zone needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

We need about $45,000 in order to break “Conex-zone” onto the market and start connection non-profits with corporate partners. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read about our campaign... for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and for helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “HMG” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

If you wish to contact us:

Website: www.HMGconnect.com

Our Social Media Connections:

ü  Linkedin

ü  Twitter:     https://twitter.com/hmgconnect

    Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ConexZone/

ü  YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO3MoBiFCtLeIt...

Contact Information

Name: Malikah Hylton

Phone Number: (615) 461-0281

E Mail: hmgconnect@gmail.com

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at hmgconnect@gmail.com

story:
Summary

Honey I'm Home Produce is a family owned business, providing customers with a range of raw and artisan products from their own beehives as well as from other keepers in Western Australia.

After 5 years of beekeeping and 3 years of trading at farmers markets and festivals (such as Taste of Perth), Honey I'm Home Produce is moving to a bigger hive!

On 5th November 2015, we are opening a honey shop in Maylands. The shop will focus on local raw honey, hand-made honey products (such as infusion and whipped honey) and beeswax beauty. In addition, other local artisan foods that compliment honey will also be featured such as bio-dynamic olive oil, nut butters and hand-made chocolate goodness (or should that be badness!).


Information sessions will also be held at the shop, covering such topics as urban beekeeping, current research updates from CIBER (the bee research group at UWA), food and medicinal uses of honey and seasonal honey tastings.

The location (213 Railway Parade, Maylands) is next to a new local raw food cafe (The Little Shop of Plenty) and located near a number of medium to high-density residential developments that will contribute to the growing food and cafe scene in Maylands.

How You Can Help (and get Sweet Rewards!)

We have put together an efficient fitout budget for the 35 sqm space, coming in at $10k. Perks for contributing (see to the right) mostly  receive gifts of equivalent value, or more, after opening.

Should we be lucky enough to receive more than $10k, there are several other areas of the business that we will be investing in, specifically:

  • Adding coffee and cafe to our offering at the Shop. Currently planning for March 2016. ~$7.5k
  • Improving our extraction and packaging facility at our house. ~$10k, and we would love to get our dining room back!
  • Contribute towards increasing our number of beehives from 35 up to 100 this season. ~$20k
  • Capital investment in equipment for both beekeeping and honey extraction and packaging to cope with 100 hives! ~$35k.

If we don't reach our target, we will fund the fitout ourselves but this will significantly reduce how much we can build up our apiary this season.

        

The Impact

Australia is one of the last place in the world where honeybees still live in the wild and bees can be kept with minimal or no chemicals or management techniques to control diseases, pests, etc.

While we won't be directly saving the bees at the Shop, this venture will help the apiculture industry through:
  • Increasing the awareness of the importance of bees as pollinators and honey as a unique food.
  • Providing education in the plight of bees globally, the importance of WA's beekeeping industry in the global perspective and improved appreciation of honey.
  • Help Blaine and Tristan continue to contribute to the industry groups that they volunteer with and/or are members of.
  • Increase the demand for local, raw honey in Western Australia, prompting further investment in apiaries to meet growing domestic and international demand for our unique 'clean and green' honey.

   

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute directly, please share this campaign to those whom may be interested!

Or feel free to come and see us at one of our markets or festivals before the shop opens to purchase some lovely local honey (including the Royal Show!).

And of course, please come and check out the shop in November. To help you find it, our awesome landlord has just commissioned a bee-themed mural for the side of the building!

story:
Hi All,

I'm trying to raise some money for my friend Muhamed. I have seen many of my friends post stuff about wanting to help out, not knowing how or being frustrated at how slow Canada is to step up to accept refugees. Here is a way to make a direct difference in the life of a family. Or at least that's my hope. :-)

About Muhamed:

(Indiegogo says I'm supposed to give some sad story that guilts people into giving money... so here goes)

I met Muhamed in my German class. He's a young guy in his early 20's from Syria and is/was in his third year of Medical School at Damascus University. His plan is to specialize in surgery. He left Syria and fled to Germany on a student visa with a goal of finishing his medical training in Germany. He came to Hannover because he has an uncle here who sponsored him. He works at McDonald's to support himself while he learns German so that he can re-start medical school in Hannover. His mom studied English in University and was an English teacher in Syria before the civil war and his dad had a clothing shop. He has two younger brothers that are in junior high school. Since Muhamed's dad hasn't been able to open the shop for because it's in a conflict zone, he had been selling coffee beans to the people remaining in his home town. However, because the situation in Syria has deteriorated, his family is now en route to Germany as refugees. They walked, I repeat WALKED out of Syria and into Turkey. They then travelled by boat to Greece where they are currently working out plans to make it by foot to Germany. They are hoping not to be detained in Hungary, but the situation is dicey.

As an aside, I asked Muhamed why his family couldn't be evacuated by one of the aid groups or charities. He told me that the charities currently operating within Syria that are helping evacuate people are Christian based and will only help facilitate transportation for Christian refugees. :-(

Originally, Muhamed had hoped that his family would be here by the end of September. He isn't sure at this point because they are stuck in Greece. He also has limited contact with them.

I am looking to raise money for Muhamed's family. Even if it's 50euros to go out for a nice dinner as a family once they all get here. If there is anything more, I'm sure that it would go to good use since their possessions are limited to what they are carrying.

He left Syria and fled to Germany on a student visa with a goal of finishing his medical training in Germany. He came to Hannover because he has an uncle here who sponsored him. He works at McDonald's to support himself while he learns German so that he can re-start medical school in Hannover. His mom studied English in University and was an English teacher in Syria before the civil war and his dad had a clothing shop. He has two younger brothers that are in junior high school. Since Muhamed's dad hasn't been able to open the shop for because it's in a conflict zone, he had been selling coffee beans to the people remaining in his home town. However, because the situation in Syria has deteriorated, his family is now en route to Germany as refugees. They walked, I repeat WALKED out of Syria and into Turkey. They then travelled by boat to Greece where they are currently working out plans to make it by foot to Germany. They are hoping not to be detained in Hungary, but the situation is dicey. As an aside, I asked Muhamed why his family couldn't be evacuated by one of the aid groups or charities. He told me that the charities currently operating within Syria that are helping evacuate people are Christian based and will only help facilitate transportation for Christian refugees. :-( Originally, Muhamed had hoped that his family would be here by the end of September. He isn't sure at this point because they are stuck in Greece. He also has limited contact with them.I am looking to raise money for Muhamed's family. Even if it's 50euros to go out for a nice dinner as a family once they all get here. If there is anything more, I'm sure that it would go to good use since their possessions are limited to what they are carrying.

story:
"Enjoy A Hot Meal With Family without Reheating Dishes . No ugly cables or power connections! First to market a truly innovative and revolutionary dining experience."

TheM dining place mats proactively maintain temperature to provide optimum heat release and distribution. When a hot dish is placed on TheM, the mat absorbs and stores the access heat. As the dish cools the excess stored heat is then released back to the dish to maintain the ideal temperature. This cycle works continuously.

TheM integrates cutting edge certified space technology into a high-end design. TheM Place Mats keep your dishes at the ideal eating temperature for 45 to 60 minutes.    

TheM requires NO charging, NO wires, NO batteries all while being cool to the touch. Very kid friendly as it's not hot to the touch!

NOTE: These mats have been tested to maintain temps for up to 120 minutes.




You slave over a hot meal and by the time your family and friends get to the table and start eating the temperature is less than optimal.

Food is usually served at 185-195 degrees Fahrenheit. The ideal eating temperature is 145-155 degrees Fahrenheit. Our mats maintain the food in a dish or plate at >150 degrees (the ideal eating temperature) Fahrenheit for a minimum of 45 minutes to an hour.

NOTE: These mats have been tested to maintain temps for up to 120 minutes.

Design Assembly:

 Design & Specs:

  • Octagon shape - 8” wide
  • Octagon shape make TheM buildable into center pieces for larger dishes (Holiday turkey, large casserole & pasta dishes etc.)
  • Each mat weighs >2lbs
  • Width 1/4 of an inch
  • Waterproof - Dishwasher safe
  • Not hot to the touch - VERY KID FRIENDLY
  • Stack-able for easy storage
  • The upper layer has a high-end finish for good heat transfer
  • Upper high-end finish is scratch resistant
  • Base is insulated Utilizes Outlast® Phase Change Technology

TECHNOLOGY

How does Outlast's Phase Change Material work for heat control? 

  • While the PCM is changing phases and absorbing or releasing energy, it is preventing temperature change. This stored energy is known as latent heat and can be measured by the DSC.  
  • Solid toLiquid – melting, ice to water, candles to wax puddles. In order to melt, you have to add or absorb energy (endothermic). Liquid to Solid – crystallization, water to ice. In order to solidify, freeze, crystallize you have to remove or release energy (exothermic)  
  • latent heat (lĀt’nt hēt) nounThe quantity of heat absorbed or released by a substance undergoing a change of state, (such as ice changing to water or wax solidifying), at constant temperature and pressure.
  • When a solid material is heated and reaches its melting point, it goes from solid to liquid. During this process the material absorbs a certain amount of heat. Despite the heat input, the temperature of the material stays at a relatively constant level, even though phase change is taking place. We thus speak of latent (concealed) heat having been taken up by the material.  
  •  Outlast technology is based on the absorption, storage and release of energy. Outlast uses a phase change material (PCM) which is a material that requires large amounts of energy to change phases (solid to liquid and back to solid) in a specific temperature range. 

Certified Test Methods  

1.) ASTM E793-01 Standard Test Method for Enthalpies of Fusion and Crystallization by Differential Scanning Calorimetry

2.) ISO 11357-3:1999 Plastics -- Differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) -- Part 3: Determination of temperature and enthalpy of melting and crystallization

3) A 9x13” 3 qt. Pyrex® glass dish filled with ~1500 grams of thickened water to mimic approximated a ¾ filled dish with very moist food. 

4) The dish was covered with aluminum foil (which remained on throughout the whole experiment) and heated to 185oF, as shown by the food thermometer in the middle of the dish.  

5) Once the dish attained 185oF, it was immediately removed and placed onto a hot glove on the bench and let sit for 10 minute. at room temperature. This approximated a standard kitchen procedure, in that the home cook would remove the “casserole” and let sit for a few minutes on either a hot pad or stove top before moving to table.

6) Temperature recording was started when pulled from oven and maintained until dish dropped below 140oF.

Program Timeline:


When and where can I use TheM? 

  • With its octagon shape TheM is buildable and can be put together for larger dishes.  
  • You can use TheM under your dining plates to keep your food hot  
  • Put a hot tea or coffee pot on TheM to keep beverages hot  
  • Place your pizza directly on TheM - non-toxic & safe materials . Do not recommend cutting pizza on TheM.
  • Use TheM under your soup bowls  
  • Coffee or Tea mugs and cup to keep beverage warm
  • Take TheM on your camping trips, cookouts and barbeques
  • Your kids will love TheM as they take 1 hour to finish a hot dog and mac and cheese
  • And so much more...

WHAT COLOR CAN I GET "TheM" IN - I AM CONFUSED?

Don't be confused - We are ONLY offering TheM in HIGH WHITE GLOSS.

NOTE: After testing, the high gloss, scratch resistant white materials work the best and are very durable long term. We do not have any plans to add more colors today.

About Us:

We are a father/daughter team that together have 55+ years of engineering, marketing and sales experience. We have always had a vision to innovate and better the consumer products industry. New technologies and innovations are entering the market place today at a higher pace than application for those technologies are being produced. That's where dad and I collaborated to make these technologies a reality and bring them directly into your homes.

My dad, Bobby Bedi has been an electrical & mechanical engineer for 40+ years working with fortune 100 & 500 companies from around the globe. He started his technology applications consultancy, Design HMI LLC, 8+ years ago that takes innovative technologies from around the world and integrates them into actual applications and consumer products. His engineering market reach goes from US to Europe to China to India to Australia... and on.

Last year (2014) Design HMI also launched a Innovations hub called Engineering Well -http://www.designhmi.com/engineering-well-tech-hub/ and a product marketing subsidiary Greenlama - www.iamgreenlama.com. 

I am Gita Bedi and I run the product marketing subsidiary GreenLama - Delivering Innovation. I have worked in marketing and sales for fortune 100 companies for 13 years. For the past 5 years have been working with startups to bring their products and projects to market successfully. 

We ran a Kickstarter Campaign in June called Nano Wireless Heated Mug that we funded in 3 days. The Nano Heated Mug will hit the market in November - ready for the holiday season! Please feel free to go to - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1768462149/nano-heated-wireless-mug-cup.These mugs are also available for pre-order on our site at - http://www.iamgreenlama.com/shop/nano-heated-mug.

We look forward to bringing you even more cutting edge, high-end design and innovative technology products that will change the way you use and see consumer products today!

Risks and challenges

There is a 10% chance that we may deliver a few days after Christmas due to shipping delays.

story: • n/a

What We Stand For

    Relentless stands for never backing down, never giving up, and to always be moving forward.

    Relentless Gym Gear strives to be the best in every aspect of our productions. From T-Shirts and Apparel to Wrist Wraps and other Gym Gear. No matter what, it will be the best quality possible. While we are more tailored for the gym, we support any and all success for any individual, across the board. Our Apparel stands for more than just another t-shirt to wear to the gym. This is a message and a movement. To be Relentless in ANYTHING that you do in life.


Who We Are

  Designers, Motivators, Educators. People with the foresight to create something unbelievable.  

What We Need & What You Get

This is the birth of the company. From the ground up. Our goal of $800 will give us the sufficient amount to start development of our already amazing ideas and designs. 
We have the knowledge of design, business, social media, and the foresight to build this great company. But we need your help!
With your contribution you will receive the following perks based upon the amount you have contributed!


The Risks & Challenges

With any business comes stress, vulnerability, and chance of failure.

This is one area where we are no different than the rest. There will be obstacle to hurdle over. Things can go wrong in production of using the wrong material. The new samples not fitting correctly. Placing the logo in the wrong place. The shipping not being 100% guaranteed to not mess up or miss deliver.

But with this will come lessons learned. Growth and knowledge for the long run of this company. We will get through anything and everything that stands in our way of providing the best quality and customer service possible. After all We Are Relentless.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone is in a place to contribute, and we understand! We thank you for your time just for reading this! 

However, if you would still like to help, then you can use any social media that you have to help spread the word of this Indiegogo Campaign and this soon-to-be company!

Bloggers/Media/Press: If you would like to cover or write about our IndieGogo Campaign then please contact us below. Thank you in advance!

Contact : relentlessgymgear@gmail.com

Social Media:

Instagram

Twitter

YouTube

Facebook

Hashtags to use! :

#relentlessgymgear

#relentless

#berelentless

#alwaysberelentless

story:
Hey I'm Heather Smith, a Chef born and raised in Baltimore Maryland.

I’m currently self employed as a Private Chef which means I get to travel and do what I love at the same time. This restaurant has always been the point. This is my dream. A space where great food and community happen. That's where all of you come in! I cannot do it without you! 

The project specifically is remodeling an already existing restaurant space. We're going to open up the top levels to create an event space, that will be used for cooking classes, private events, live music, the works!

So, why the name '12:34' (twelve thirty-four)? Ever since I can remember, I always catch that time on the clock, on my cell phone, when I'm home, when I'm out, seriously, always. It's become almost soothing. LOL. It also has, over time, become representative of time in the broader sense, as in:

IT'S TIME for us to stop being afraid to pursue our dreams.

IT'S TIME for people to start eating food that they love and that loves them back.

IT'S TIME to stop feeling guilty for "eating out", because I'm cooking with the same love and thoughtfulness that you would.

IT'S TIME to have a space to go, to learn about good food and where it comes from.

IT'S TIME for the place you wish existed, where you can come in, put a record on and enjoy food and service that’s second to none.

IT'S TIME for '12:34'...

I have been in the food service industry for over fifteen years, the last several years in a management role. Over the past four years I’ve learned and grown so much, teaching food and nutrition at the elementary/middle school level, I was the Chef on a farm, I taught Culinary Arts as part of an Art program for young people on Aruba as well as at the High School level here locally in Baltimore. Those experiences working with the youth, particularly of my City, have been priceless. Your contribution will allow my teaching to continue, just in a different setting. We are what we eat! Food is medicine – at least it can and should be. Don’t eat that! These are things none of us would know unless someone told us.

IT’S TIME to demystify eating well.

Let’s get down to business. We need to raise Seventy-five Thousand Dollars ($75,000.00) in order for ’12:34’ to open its doors. I know we can do it! There is NO contribution too small and certainly none too big. If you aren’t able to contribute financially yourself, please share the link on all of your social media accounts. Please talk about it to people and tell them to come check us out! Share, Share and Share some more. If each of my Facebook friends were to commit to sharing my link and getting ten people to give $10 or more … We can’t lose! And to my new friends reading this and just learning about me for the first time, thank you for your support and I can't wait to  see your face all up in the place.

IT'S TIME...

story:
english readers please look below

WILLKOMMEN//

BEI UNSERER KAMPAGNE//


Gliederung:

  • Wer sind wir?
  • Was brauchen wir?
  • Wieso machen wir das?
  • Warum heben wir uns ab?
  • Wie könnt ihr uns unterstützen?
  • Wo wollen wir unser Projekt starten?
  • Was können wir abschließend noch sagen?


#WER

Wir, Christopher (20) und Sebastian (28), sind das Team hinter my-food.at und möchten den Online-Lebensmittelhandel in Österreich auf ein neues Level bringen.

Wir alle sind Individualisten und haben individuelle Lebens- bzw. Ernährungsgewohnheiten. Allergien sind heutzutage weitverbreitet und alternative Essenausrichtungen gewinnen an Zuwachs. Diesen Wandel unterstützen wir und bieten ein maßgeschneidertes Produkt dazu an.

In herkömmlichen Online-Supermärkten werden Produkte nach Produktgruppen sortiert - unpersönlich und standardisiert. Wir sortieren unsere Produkte nach unseren Kunden und Ihren Lebensausrichtungen - für eine einfache und schnelle Bestellung, ohne die Produktbeschreibung nach Allergenen oder Inhaltsstoffen zu durchsuchen zu müssen.


die Startseite von http://www.my-food.at


#WAS

Eine kurze Hochrechnung ergab, dass wir unsere ersten Ausgaben nicht selbst aufwenden können - zu groß sind die Ausgaben für die ersten Lebensmittel, ein Transportfahrzeug oder die Kaution für unser Lager (Details siehe unten). Dennoch möchten wir nicht zu Lasten der Kunden Einsparungen treffen, die dazu führen, dass eines unserer Kernziele - die Kundenzufriendenheit - belastet.

Gerne geben wir euch einen kurzen Überblick, wie wir unser Budget verwenden möchten:

  • Gründung der Rechtsform
  • Kaution für unser Zwischenlager
  • Kosten für Hygienestandards
  • Tiefkühl- und Kühlzellen
  • Lebensmittel Ersteinkauf
  • Werbungskosten
  • Kundentransportboxen


#WIESO

Die Individualisierung steht bei uns ganz oben. Wir fokussieren daher im Detail auf die gängigen Ernährungstrends, Allergien oder Krankheiten. Für alle Kunden die keines davon aufweisen bieten wir zusätzlich unser Produktportfolio wie üblich nach Warengruppen sortiert an. 


Produktübersicht (beispielhaft hier Produkte der Firma Moser http://www.moserwurst.at)


Wir haben die wichtigsten Gruppen herausgearbeitet und möchten in diese unterteilen:

  • Vegan

  • Vegetarisch

  • BIO

  • Fruktoseintoleranz

  • Laktoseintoleranz 

  • Nussalergie

  • Fischalergie

  • Diverse Diäten 

  • Diabetes 

  • Low Carb

  • Kraftnahrung


die Unterteilung in Kategorien auf http://www.my-food.at

#WARUM

Um die Individualisierung zu perfektionieren ist es selbstverständlich möglich, diese Gruppen über die Such- und Filterfunktion zu kombinieren. Wer sagt, dass ein Vegetarier nicht auch eine Nussallergie entwickeln kann? Durch diese und weitere Funktionen machen wir das Einkaufserlebnis perfekt.


unsere Filter- und Suchenfunktionen


Wir wissen selbstverständlich, dass es bereits von den großen Ketten auch Online-Shops Ihrer Produkte gibt. Dennoch - und im Speziellen weil wir so anders sind - glauben wir daran, dies besser umsetzten zu können. BIO-Lebensmittelgeschäfte sind zumeist teurer und trotzdem erfolgreich. Sie haben das Wichtigste umgesetzt: sie haben auf die Kundenwünsche reagiert.


nach der Auswahl der Kategorie sind alle Produkte angepasst z.B. vegetarisch


Auch in Sachen Lieferung möchten wir uns von anderen Shops unterscheiden und werden neben einer Zeitfester-Lieferung auch eine Liefermöglichkeit für unsere Kunden anbieten die eine Anwesenheit des Empfängers bei der Lieferung nicht voraussetzt. Du kannst unsere Produkte von jedem Ort der Welt bestellen und wenn du nach Hause kommst, sind deine Lebensmittel schon da - egal ob normale, gekühlte oder tiefgekühlte Waren - eine Art mobile Packstation macht dies möglich - nur viel einfacher - lass dich einfach überraschen, wir glauben, es wird dir gefallen.


#WIE

Um starten zu können, bitten wir euch um eure Unterstützung in Form einer kleinen Spende.

Und zur Erweiterung des Bekanntheitsgrades teilt bitte unsere Kampagne auf facebook und twitter.


#WO

Wir starten zuerst in Österreichs Hauptstadt Wien. Ziel ist es allerdings, ganz Österreich beliefern zu können.


#SCHLUSSWORT

Noch Fragen?

Schaut euch doch einmal für einen ersten Überblick unsere Idee auf unserer Beta-Website an: http://www.my-food.at

Kritik, Anregungen oder Wünsche? Positiv wie negativ - gerne an kundenservice@my-food.at


Wir würden uns freuen, wenn wir euch schon bald beliefern dürften - auf jeden Fall vorweg vielen Dank für jede Unterstützung.


Es grüßen euch,

Christopher & Sebastian




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WELCOME//

TO OUR CAMPAIGN//

Structure:

  • Who are we?
  • What do we need?
  • Why are we doing this?
  • Which idea is so special with us?
  • How can you support us?
  • Where is this project gonna start?
  • Final words we want to say


#WHO

We, Christopher (20) and Sebastian (28), are the team behind my-food.at and we create a new way how to order food over the internet. Everybody needs different food because everyone is different. That's why our system reduces the amount of time, people need to collect their food into the basket - we pre-sort our products into lifestlyes or allergies to reduce the time for searching the right product.


startpage of http://www.my-food.at


#WHAT

To realize our idea, we need your help because there are many things we need to give our costumers the best service we can. 

We want to give you a short summary how we'd like to spend our budget:

  • legal form
  • deposit for our storage
  • reach a hygenic standard in the storage
  • freezing- and colling cells
  • first food purchage
  • advertisement
  • carriage boxes for clients


#WHY

We care about the society's needs - that’s why nutrition trends, food allergies and diseases are our main focus. And we also serve food like in a normal online supermarket for those who don't have special nutritions or deseases.

product overview (here as an example with products of Firma Moser http://www.moserwurst.at)


At the beginning we focus on the following nutrition groups: 

  • Vegan 

  • Vegetarian 

  • Organic food 

  • Lactose intolerance 

  • Fructose intolerance 

  • Nut allergy 

  • Fish allergy 

  • Diabetes 

  • Low-Carb 

  • Sport nutrition 



the sorting of http://www.my-food.at

#WHICH

So if you fit in one of these groups just click on it and our repertoire is filtered to your desire. We are working veryhard on the database that this works properly and it never happens, that e.g. a product like salmon appears in the fish allergy category. Of course our customers don't see this effort - they just see the right products for them.


our filtering- and sorting-functions


We know there are risks because the food industry is dominated by the big supermarket groups and it´s a real challenge to establish on the market for a start-up - but nowadays society cares as much about its food as never before - that's why alternatives like bio-supermarkets are booming though they are more expensive. But they found out was is most important: to serve the people needs.


after chosing your category, all products are now pre-filtered e.g. vegetarian


Another unique feature that we offer is our special delivery system. We basicly deliever in time frames. This frames can be selected by the customer himself in the checkout procedure. In addition we offer a special system for steady customers which even elliminates the need to be at home when we deliever - comparable with a mobile parcel station - but much more easier - let us surprise you, we think, you will like it.


#HOW

To get this started, we are asking you for your support in terms of a little bounty.

And to make this campaign more famous, share our idea on facebook or twitter please.


#WHERE

We will start this project in the capital of Austria, Vienna. Our aim is expandanding to the whole country.


#FINAL

Further questions?

Get a first impression of our idea on our beta-webpage: http://www.my-food.at

Feedback - positiv and negativ - we like to hear about it on kundenservice@my-food.at


We would be glad if we could deliever you very soon.

Anyway, thank you very much in advance.


Yours,

Christopher & Sebastian
story_txt:
english readers please look belowWILLKOMMEN//
BEI UNSERER KAMPAGNE//

Gliederung:

Wer sind wir?
Was brauchen wir?
Wieso machen wir das?

Warum heben wir uns ab?

Wie könnt ihr uns unterstützen?
Wo wollen wir unser Projekt starten?
Was können wir abschließend noch sagen?




#WER
Wir, Christopher (20) und Sebastian (28), sind das Team hinter my-food.at und möchten den Online-Lebensmittelhandel in Österreich auf ein neues Level bringen. 
Wir
 alle sind Individualisten und haben individuelle Lebens- bzw. 
Ernährungsgewohnheiten. Allergien sind heutzutage weitverbreitet und 
alternative Essenausrichtungen gewinnen an Zuwachs. Diesen Wandel unterstützen wir und bieten ein maßgeschneidertes Produkt dazu an. 
In herkömmlichen Online-Supermärkten werden Produkte nach Produktgruppen sortiert -
 unpersönlich und standardisiert. Wir sortieren unsere Produkte nach 
unseren Kunden und Ihren Lebensausrichtungen - für eine einfache und 
schnelle Bestellung, ohne die Produktbeschreibung nach Allergenen oder 
Inhaltsstoffen zu durchsuchen zu müssen.



die Startseite von http://www.my-food.at

#WAS
Eine
 kurze Hochrechnung ergab, dass wir unsere ersten Ausgaben nicht selbst 
aufwenden können - zu groß sind die Ausgaben für die ersten 
Lebensmittel, ein Transportfahrzeug oder die Kaution für unser Lager 
(Details siehe unten). Dennoch möchten wir nicht zu Lasten der Kunden 
Einsparungen treffen, die dazu führen, dass eines unserer Kernziele - 
die Kundenzufriendenheit - belastet.
Gerne geben wir euch einen kurzen Überblick, wie wir unser Budget verwenden möchten:




Gründung der Rechtsform
Kaution für unser Zwischenlager
Kosten für Hygienestandards
Tiefkühl- und Kühlzellen
Lebensmittel Ersteinkauf 
Werbungskosten
Kundentransportboxen



#WIESO
Die
 Individualisierung steht bei uns ganz oben. Wir fokussieren daher im 
Detail auf die gängigen Ernährungstrends, Allergien oder Krankheiten. 
Für alle Kunden die keines davon aufweisen bieten wir zusätzlich unser 
Produktportfolio wie üblich nach Warengruppen sortiert an. 



Produktübersicht (beispielhaft hier Produkte der Firma Moser http://www.moserwurst.at) 


Wir haben die wichtigsten Gruppen herausgearbeitet und möchten in diese unterteilen:


Vegan
Vegetarisch
BIO
Fruktoseintoleranz
Laktoseintoleranz 
Nussalergie
Fischalergie
Diverse Diäten 
Diabetes 
Low Carb
Kraftnahrung






die Unterteilung in Kategorien auf http://www.my-food.at

#WARUM
Um
 die Individualisierung zu perfektionieren ist es selbstverständlich 
möglich, diese Gruppen über die Such- und Filterfunktion zu kombinieren.
 Wer sagt, dass ein Vegetarier nicht auch eine Nussallergie entwickeln 
kann? Durch diese und weitere Funktionen machen wir das Einkaufserlebnis perfekt.



unsere Filter- und Suchenfunktionen

Wir wissen selbstverständlich, dass es bereits von den großen Ketten
 auch Online-Shops Ihrer Produkte gibt. Dennoch - und im Speziellen weil
 wir so anders sind - glauben wir daran, dies besser umsetzten zu können. BIO-Lebensmittelgeschäfte sind zumeist teurer und trotzdem erfolgreich. Sie haben das Wichtigste umgesetzt: sie haben auf die Kundenwünsche reagiert.



nach der Auswahl der Kategorie sind alle Produkte angepasst z.B. vegetarisch

Auch
 in Sachen Lieferung möchten wir uns von anderen Shops unterscheiden und
 werden neben einer Zeitfester-Lieferung auch eine Liefermöglichkeit für unsere Kunden anbieten die eine 
Anwesenheit des Empfängers bei der Lieferung nicht voraussetzt. Du 
kannst unsere Produkte von jedem Ort der Welt bestellen und wenn 
du nach Hause kommst, sind deine Lebensmittel schon da - egal ob normale, gekühlte oder tiefgekühlte Waren - eine Art mobile Packstation macht dies möglich - nur viel einfacher - lass dich einfach überraschen, wir glauben, es wird dir gefallen. 


#WIE

Um starten zu können, bitten wir euch um eure Unterstützung in Form einer kleinen Spende.Und zur Erweiterung des Bekanntheitsgrades teilt bitte unsere Kampagne auf facebook und twitter.#WOWir starten zuerst in Österreichs Hauptstadt Wien. Ziel ist es allerdings, ganz Österreich beliefern zu können.#SCHLUSSWORTNoch Fragen? Positiv wie negativ - gerne an kundenservice@my-food.atWir würden uns freuen, wenn wir euch schon bald beliefern dürften - auf jeden Fall vorweg vielen Dank für jede Unterstützung.Es grüßen euch,Christopher & Sebastian ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------WELCOME//TO OUR CAMPAIGN//

story:
Who are we

We are a group of volunteers concerned with socio-environmental issues from Mexico, Peru, Ecuador, Colombia, Brazil, Argentina, Panama, Venezuela, Spain, and the Muisca and Sapara nations. Our group is engage with the vision and work of the Pachamama Alliance in Latin America and Spain. We have a common purpose: to generate an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet.  In this process, we focus on creating a critical mass of conscious committed citizens that can generate a more positive future. In our work we

integrate the wisdom of the ancient people with modern knowledge to support personal and group transformation.

For the past three years we have met in different territories in order to create common strategies, share our knowledge, learn together, make agreements and work on ourselves as human beings. Our goal is to put all of this in the service of local communities and effectively help to generate game changing actions.

This year we have an ambitious plan: hold our annual meeting in the Sápara Indigenous Nation (in the middle of the Amazon rainforest). We want to exchange knowledge and learn from their community processes that have proven to be very effective both in building social fabric as in their interaction with the natural world. Our aim is to integrate this knowledge with the modern world to provide sensitizing tools and actions that promote community development in the region of Iberoamerica. 

We also want to give our in conditional support to one of our leaders, Manari who has been an example of the Sapara culture and a tireless activist in protecting the Amazon rainforest. In 2001 the Sapara Nation was declared by the UNESCO as Intangible Heritage of Humanity.

As Manari says: “We Saparas have developed our own system of living, recognizing that all of the elements that make up nature are living beings which have spirits equal to us. So we all need to help one another in order to maintain the equilibrium of our lives and of nature”

Therefore this community opened the doors of its territory to share with visitors their ancestral knowledge, customs, stories, food and experiences that can only be explain in its real magnitude within the forest.

Quiénes Somos

Somos un grupo de líderes voluntarios de México, Perú, Ecuador, Colombia, Brasil, Argentina, Panamá, Venezuela, España y las naciones Muisca y Sápara; dedicados a expandir la visión y el trabajo de la Alianza Pachamama en Latinoamérica y España.   Tenemos un propósito común: generar una presencia humana en el planeta, que sea ambientalmente sustentable, socialmente justa y espiritualmente plena. En este proceso nos concentramos en generar una masa crítica de ciudadanos conscientes que puedan generar un futuro más positivo. En nuestro trabajo integramos la sabiduría de los pueblos ancestrales con los conocimientos modernos para apoyar transformaciones personales y grupales.

Desde hace tres años, realizamos encuentros en diferentes territorios para generar estrategias conjuntas, compartir saberes, tener aprendizajes colectivos, hacer acuerdos y trabajar en nuestro SER, para poner todo esto al servicio de las comunidades locales en las que tenemos injerencia y generar efectivamente acciones que cambien el juego.

Este año tenemos un plan ambicioso: Realizar nuestro encuentro  anual en la Nación Sápara (en el Amazonas), con el fin de intercambiar saberes y aprender de sus procesos comunitarios que han demostrado ser muy efectivos tanto en la construcción de tejido social como en su interacción con el entorno.  Nuestro propósito es integrar estos conocimientos con los del mundo moderno para ofrecer herramientas de sensibilización y acción comunitaria en Iberoamérica.

Así mismo queremos dar nuestro apoyo incondicional a uno de nuestros líderes, Manari quien ha sido un estandarte de la cultura Sápara y un activista incansable en la protección de la Amazonía.En el 2001 la Nación Sápara fue declarada por la UNESCO como Patrimonio Inmaterial de la Humanidad.

Como dice Manari, “en la nación Sápara hemos desarrollado nuestro sistema de vida y reconocemos que todos los elementos que conforman la naturaleza son seres vivos que tienen espíritus al igual que nosotros. Es por ello que tenemos que ayudarnos los unos a los otros para mantener el equilibrio de nuestras vidas y de la naturaleza”

Por este motivo esta comunidad abrió las puertas de su territorio para compartir con los visitantes sus conocimientos ancestrales, costumbres, historias, alimentos y vivencias que solo pueden ser explicadas en su real magnitud en medio del bosque.



The requested support 

To organize this meeting with key leaders from our movement coming from Mexico, Brazil, Colombia, Peru, Argentina, Ecuador, Spain and the Muisca Nation, we need to raise US$10,000. This money will cover the costs of transportation to the Amazon and compensate the community for the accommodation and meals for our group during 5 days. Each leader from Latin America and Spain will undertake the flight costs to Quito.

El apoyo que solicitamos

Para realizar en este encuentro con líderes clave de nuestro movimiento de México, Brasil, Colombia, Perú, Argentina, Ecuador, España y la nación Muisca necesitamos recaudar  USD 10. 000. Este dinero cubrirá los gastos de alquiler de avionetas para trasladarnos a la Amazonía y remunerar a la comunidad Sapara por el hospedaje y alimentación de nuestro grupo durante 5 días.  Cada uno de nosotros como líderes de la región Iberoamericana nos hemos comprometido a asumir los gastos de avión a Quito para iniciar desde allí la travesía. 

Objectives of our meeting

  • Experiment and learn alongside the Sápara nation their ways of building community and interact effectively with their natural environment in order to weave in their wisdom to propose new alternatives of interaction in our communities.
  • Follow-up on our work and plan new actions to continue designing tools for raising awareness and specific community actions in the region of Iberoamerica.
  • Get to know the experiences and initiatives in each region that allow our movement to be even more effective.
  • Support the Sápara community reporting their actions throughout Iberoamerica to protect the rainforest.
  • Further strengthening us, as Iberomerican Leader Group as we have been doing for the past three years.

  http://www.pachamama.org/news/23-new-leaders-committed-ibero- 

american-region

Objetivo de nuestro encuentro

  • Experimentar y aprender junto a la nación Sapara sus maneras de construir comunidad e interactuar de una manera efectiva con su entorno natural con el fin de entretejer conocimientos para plantear nuevas alternativas de interacción en nuestras zonas de influencia.
  • Dar seguimiento a nuestro trabajo y planear nuevas acciones para continuar diseñando herramientas de sensibilización y acción comunitaria en Iberoamérica.
  • Conocer las experiencias e iniciativas en cada región que le permitan a nuestro movimiento ser aún más efectivo.
  •  Apoyar a la comunidad Sapara divulgando su accionar en toda Iberoamérica para proteger la selva.
  • Seguir fortaleciéndonos como Grupo de Líderes Iberomericanos como lo hemos venido haciendo desde hace tres años.

http://www.pachamama.org/news/23-new-leaders-committed-ibero-american-region

The impact of your contribution

By supporting this project, you are allowing committed leaders from different countries to continue working towards a more sustainable, just and fulfilling world.

You are also supporting the Sápara nation in their actions and tireless fight to protect the Amazon rainforest and culture that is in danger of disappearing due to the threat of the modern world.

El Impacto de tu contribución

Al apoyar este proyecto estas permitiendo que líderes comprometidos de diferentes países continúen trabajando por un mundo más sustentable, justo y pleno.

También, estás apoyando a la Nación Sápara en su accionar y lucha incansable por proteger la selva amazónica y su cultura que está en peligro de desaparecer por la amenaza del mundo moderno. 


About the Pachamama Alliance

The Pachamama Alliance is a nonprofit organization that was born out of a call from the Ecuadorian Amazon communities when they saw the threat that the current consumer society represents to the rainforest. For the past 20 years, this organization, has worked to empower the Amazonian communities to protect their culture and lands. Besides that, they have been working as well in sensitizing the western world promoting an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet. The Pachamama Alliance develops its purpose through donations from people all around the world that are in alignment with this vision (www.pachamama.org) 

Acerca la Alianza Pachamama

La Alianza Pachamama es una organización sin fines de lucro que nace de un llamado de las comunidades amazónicas ecuatorianas al ver la amenaza que la actual sociedad de consumo representa para la selva.  Durante 20 años,  ha trabajado en empoderar a las comunidades amazónicas para proteger su cultura y sus tierras, al tiempo que trabaja en la sensibilización del mundo occidental promoviendo una presencia humana en el planeta que sea ambientalmente sustentable, socialmente justa y espiritualmente plena.

La Alianza Pachamama opera gracias a los donativos de individuos de todo el mundo alineados con este propósito. (www.pachamama.org)

     us, as Iberomerican Leader Group as we have been doing for the past three
     years.

  http://www.pachamama.org/news/23-new-leaders-committed-ibero-  
american-region
Objetivo de nuestro encuentro

Experimentar
     y aprender junto a la nación Sapara sus maneras de construir comunidad e
     interactuar de una manera efectiva con su entorno natural con el fin de
     entretejer conocimientos para plantear nuevas alternativas de interacción
     en nuestras zonas de influencia.
Dar seguimiento a nuestro trabajo y planear
     nuevas acciones para continuar diseñando herramientas de sensibilización y
     acción comunitaria en Iberoamérica.
Conocer las experiencias e iniciativas en cada
     región que le permitan a nuestro movimiento ser aún más efectivo.
 Apoyar a la comunidad Sapara divulgando
     su accionar en toda Iberoamérica para proteger la selva.
Seguir fortaleciéndonos como Grupo de Líderes
     Iberomericanos como lo hemos venido haciendo desde hace tres años.

http://www.pachamama.org/news/23-new-leaders-committed-ibero-american-region

The impact of your
contribution
By
supporting this project, you are allowing committed leaders from different
countries to continue working towards a more sustainable, just and fulfilling
world.
You
are also supporting the Sápara nation in their actions and tireless fight to
protect the Amazon rainforest and culture that is in danger of disappearing due
to the threat of the modern world.
El Impacto de tu contribución
Al apoyar
este proyecto estas permitiendo que líderes comprometidos de diferentes países
continúen trabajando por un mundo más sustentable, justo y pleno.
También,
estás apoyando a la Nación Sápara en su accionar y lucha incansable por
proteger la selva amazónica y su cultura que está en peligro de desaparecer por
la amenaza del mundo moderno. 



About the Pachamama Alliance
The Pachamama Alliance is a nonprofit organization that was born out of a call from the Ecuadorian Amazon communities when they saw the threat that the current consumer society represents to the rainforest. For the past 20 years, this organization, has worked to empower the Amazonian communities to protect their culture and lands. Besides that, they have been working as well in sensitizing the western world promoting an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet. The Pachamama Alliance develops its purpose through donations from people all around the world that are in alignment with this vision (www.pachamama.org) 
Acerca la Alianza Pachamama
La Alianza Pachamama es una organización sin fines de lucro que nace de un llamado de las comunidades amazónicas ecuatorianas al ver la amenaza que la actual sociedad de consumo representa para la selva.  Durante 20 años,  ha trabajado en empoderar a las comunidades amazónicas para proteger su cultura y sus tierras, al tiempo que trabaja en la sensibilización del mundo occidental promoviendo una presencia humana en el planeta que sea ambientalmente sustentable, socialmente justa y espiritualmente plena.
La Alianza Pachamama opera gracias a los donativos de individuos de todo el mundo alineados con este propósito. (www.pachamama.org)

story:
"I Just Want a Popsicle..."

Most of the best inventions are borne of necessity. Some folks might not think having a popsicle or ice cold beer while enjoying a day out on the water is exactly a "necessity," but after an hour or so under DC's brutal summer sun, it sure feels awfully close to it.

That's how Nauti Foods came about. A couple summers ago while out in their boat on the Potomac, Tammar Berger turned to her soon-to-be fiance, Ari Fingeroth, and exclaimed/questioned, "All I want is a popsicle. Why isn't there somewhere I can buy a popsicle while we're out on the water?" It was a great, great question. Why wasn't there anything equivalent to a food truck on the Potomac--or anywhere else, for that matter? With that one question, began Ari's mission to make that happen (because that's what good guys do for the women they love).  By mid-summer the following year, after jumping through all kinds of regulatory hoops and securing all the proper permits, Nauti Foods and DC's very first aquatic food truck, the Nauti Boat, were born.

With last summer's Nauti Foods Nauti Boat prototype, Ari and Tammar soon realized that they didn't just launch DC's first aquatic food truck, they launched one of the very first fully operational foodboats in the country. The response was enormous, effortlessly gaining attention from local (Washingtonian, Washington Post, Prince of Petworth, and more) and national (NPR) media outlets--but the welcome from boaters, paddlers, swimmers, and conservation groups was even more overwhelmingly positive.

By summer's end, it was clear that Nauti Foods was something that needed to be expanded upon, and bolstered to bring even more great local food, beer and fun to DC's urban waterways and even onto urban waterways in cities beyond. Given the tremendous response, and the potential benefits to enhancing the experience of water enthusiasts and bringing attention to water conservation efforts, Ari and Tammar envision Nauti Foods expanding throughout the DC/DelMarVa region and ultimately the nation.

Meet Ari & Tammar

Ari and Tammar are two DC-transplants who fell in love with the Stars and Bars (and each other) and never looked back. 

Originally from New Hampshire, where he grew up spending summer days and nights in his family's cabin on a lake, Ari's long held a love and deepest respect for the water and nature. When he moved to DC for a job in Building, he nearly packed up and left town when summer hit, till he learned about the wealth of water-based activities to be had on the Potomac. Over time, he got his own boat--and built his own small, local firm, Federalist Builders, dedicated to excellence in craftsmanship, and committed to Green Building initiatives as well as giving back to the community through its Federalist Fund.

Tammar grew up in Canada, not on a lake, but surrounded by nature, which early on instilled a deep love for the  outdoors and commitment to leading an active, healthy lifestyle. Now a lawyer with the World Bank, her passion for fitness and cycling--as well as desire to help her DC friends and neighbors pursue healthy lifestyles--led her to partnering with a friend to form Off Road Indoor Cycling nearly 3 years ago. Off Road Indoor Cycling was just named Washington City Paper's 2015 Best Indoor Cycling Studio, and is known for not only its excellent, creative. fun classes, but for serving the community and supporting causes with their "Gives Back" Program. It also happens to be the place where Ari and Tammar first met.

They're set to get married this fall.


Meet Nauti 

Nauti Foods is the parent company of the Nauti Boat. The Nauti Boat is a reconfigured 1984 Pontoon Boat that's licensed and permitted to serve just like a food truck, but on the water--and serve beer. The Nauti Boat will carry and serve a rotating variety of local foods and beverages from some of DC's favorite local restaurants, including Bullfrog Bagels and Atlas Brew Works throughout the summer, every weekend, with some bonus days scattered throughout.

In addition to offering local products, Nauti Foods offers a small-but-growing selection of food products proprietary to the Nauti Boat, including:

Nauti Dog: Fresh-off-the-grill Corkscrew-Cut Jumbo Hebrew National Hot Dog



Nauti Monkey: Freshly made Chocolate-Covered Frozen Banana

What Nauti Boat Needs

Last year's Nauti Boat essentially served as the prototype, the first of its kind in more way than one. The 1984 24ft Pontoon Boat was fully functional, but all the parts need upgrading.

Motor $10K - The current motor is still the original 1984 engine. The likelihood of it starting is increasingly iffy, taking several turns to actually start. One day soon, it won't. It's also not an efficient motor and not environmentally sound.
It absolutely needs to be replaced this season. The desired motor is quieter, safer, more efficient and will definitely start.

Generator $2K - The generator is essential to keeping food fresh & safe, ice cream and popsicles frozen, and beers cold. Knowing that generators could be extremely loud and inefficient, Ari modified the one they purchased, adding on a muffler and other features to reduce noise and boost efficiency. Unfortunately, those modifications weren't enough to keep it from being disruptively loud. The new TriFuel Generator will reduce noise by 50% and use energy far more efficiently--making for a better experience for fellow boaters and paddlers as well as the environment.

Refrigerator $2K - Last year, since cost was a huge concern, Ari and Tammar purchased a top-loading freezer (which is a whole lot cheaper than a refrigerator) and modified it to work as a refrigerator...kind of. Items on the side of the freezer continued to freeze--cans burst,  product was lost. This year they're looking to purchase a true refrigerator that keeps products at optimum temperature, with glass doors to best display and promote product.

Tap System $2K - Through Ari's sheer persistence, Nauti Foods secured a liquor license to serve beer and wine off the Naut Boat this summer. He and Tammar have already formed friendships and partnerships with local craft beer companies and non-alcoholic beverage providers (G by Mike Isabella's kegged lemonade) for the Nauti Boat to serve ice cold drinks from the tap. But to make those ice-cold drinks happen a tap system needs to be installed. Ari's designed a proprietary tow-behind keg system--now he just need to the funds to make it a reality. 

Docking/Storage Fees $3K - Everyone knows that having a boat's not cheap. Ari's gone out of his way to secure docking and storage that's affordable, but without seed money, even the cheapest rates sting.

Technology (for inventory, tracking, payments) $2K - Bringing refreshments for sale out on the water comes with some unique business challenges. Two of the big ones being helping people find you, and then once they do, making sure they have a way to pay you. (Not many folks bring money out with them on their paddleboard.) Both of these things are easily solved through technological solutions, like Square (pay with Square) and Paypal, among others. Tracking devices can also be employed to make it easy for potential customers to find Nauti on the water, where the streets have no name.

Marketing/PR $3K
Photography/Videography $4K
Social Media $3K
Partnership development $2K
What good is a business if no one knows about it? Getting Nauti properly launched into a marketplace that's never seen anything like it, and helping Nauti grow and develop into other locations and cities, is going to take a whole lot of work from friends who specialize in these things. 

Vision and Expansion
Any and all funds raised beyond the initial $30K goal would be directly applied to research and development for bringing Nauti Foods' Nauti Boat to other areas on DC's urban waterways, DelMarVa, and popular boating spots beyond--from Nauti Chesapeake, to Nauti Austin, Nauti Boston, Nauti Outerbanks, and more! The potential to enhance the experience out on the water across the nation is limitless.

Help us make this dream a reality!

Donation Perks

  • $10: Nauti Koozie
  • $25: Nauti Gift Pack: Koozie, Sunglasses, Temporary Nauti Tattoos 
  • $25: Nauti Snack Pack: Drink of your choice, Nauti Dog and Nauti Monkey
  • $50: Nauti Gift Pack + Nauti Hat 
  • $60: Nauti Gift Pack + Nauti T-Shirt
  • $100: Nauti Gift Pack + Nauti T-Shirt + Nauti Hat
  • $150: Nauti Boat Ride Along 
    Ride onboard the Nauti Boat for an hour
  • $250: Nauti Boat Treat Naming
    Get named after you for the weekend
  • $500: Nauti Happy Hour 
    Includes 2 hours in Nauti Boat's sister speed boat with drinks/snacks from Nauti Boat
  • $1000: Nauti Sunset Monument Tour
     Includes 2 hours in Nauti Boat's sister speed boat with Catered Dinner Basket
  • $1000: Nauti Treat Naming for One Month
    Get a Nauti Treat named after you or someone you love.
  • $2000: Nauti Private Event 
    Have Nauti onsite to serve guests for 2 hours at your private boating event.
  • $3,500 Advertise on Nauti's Paddle Board for One Month
    Your logo, front and center on the Paddle Board affixed to the right side of the Nauti Boat, for all to see, all day and all night.
  • $4000: Nauti Treat Naming Memorial Day - Labor Day
     Get a Nauti Treat named after you or someone you love.
  • $4000 Advertise on Nauti's Cooler for One Month 
    Your logo, front and center on the Nauti Boat, for all to see, all day and all night. 
  • $12,000 Advertise on Nauti's Cooler Memorial Day - Labor Day 
    Your logo, front and center on the Nauti Boat, for all to see, all day and all night. 
  • $10,500 Advertise on Nauti's Paddle Board Memorial Day - Labor Day
    Your logo, front and center on the Paddle Board affixed to the right side of the Nauti Boat, for all to see, all day and all night.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute funds to getting the Nauti Boat back on the water this summer, you can still play a critical role in helping support DC's urban waterways.

  • Please help us word out and make some noise about our campaign through your Facebook, Twitter and Instagram pages.
  • Be sure to join us for various water cleanup and charity events we're looking forward to partnering on this summer with DC's many wonderful water conservation organizations.

story:
As seen In Minneapolis Star Tribune, Miami Herald, Pittsburgh Post Gazette, Fox 14 TV Joplin & Pittsburg and International Business Times - NY


THE SPOT STUFF STORY.......

SPOT STUFF is a revolutionary new DRY Powder Instant Stain Remover for oil, grease or fat based stains.  SPOT STUFF is all natural, eco-friendly, non-toxic and works in minutes without washing!  
Best of all SPOT STUFF can even be used to take out OLD stains that have been washed and dried for up to a year!  (See before and after pictures below). 
13 Million tons of textiles end up in landfills every year. Use SPOT STUFF to take it out instead of throwing it out!!

                                                         

Take a peek below at some of the spots we’ve removed with SPOT STUFF along the way In minutes and with NO washing!

Lemon butter pasta sauce on jeans -Before - During - After SPOT STUFF

(Captured with Cell phone - All Unretouched photos)     

  Grease on the car visor – No Problem….Before and after SPOT STUFF(Unretouched photos)

                                       

         Before - During - After removal of béarnaise Sauce with SPOT STUFF
                                              (Unretouched photos)-

         Nacho Cheese Dip on the Boat Carpet – Before & After SPOT STUFF   Unretouched photos)

  

Hamburger dropped on the car seat – Before –During -After SPOT STUFF

(All Unretouched Photos)

Salad Dressing on a Silk Blouse……Before, During and After SPOT STUFF(Unretouched Cell Phone photos)

Best of all.....

The before and after shots below are Bratwurst grease sprayed all over an old favorite sweatshirt ……then it was washed and dried for…….OVER A YEAR  and  SPOT STUFF still got all the grease spots out in 3 minutes!!

(All unretouched cell phone photos)

      

What we need now is YOUR HELP to raise at least $10,000 to get SPOT STUFF  production started and make it available for  everyone!! 

We have put a lot of time and money into SPOT STUFF, but the equipment, infrastructure and patents necessary to get SPOT STUFF out on the market are expensive, so we are going to need your help to make it available for everyone!!! 

As a SPOT STUFF supporter you will be the first to try SPOT STUFF before it hits the market......... no more embarrassment when you have a spill while attending a meeting or other important event. Use SPOT STUFF to remove that salad dressing, gravy, pizza grease or other oil, grease or fat based stain from your clothing, car, boat, furniture or carpet to name a few! 

SPOT STUFF can help to remove it in minutes without washing!!! 

There are some great benefits to being a SPOT STUFF supporter....... So get in on the deals.......check out our PERKS and help us get started!    


The Impact

SPOT STUFF’s innovative patent pending technology was developed and tested in the United States, and unlike traditional washing or other instant removers SPOT STUFF.....

  • Consumes no energy to clean
  • Removes even old, washed & dried oil or grease stains
  • Doesn’t leave a big wet ring like the other sticks and wipes on the market
  • Is environmentally friendly
  • Non-toxic
  • Easy on your wallet                  

               =    

Use SPOT STUFF to take it out instead of throwing it out....... Keep from contributing to the 13 million tons of textiles that end up in landfills annually!
___________________________________________________________________
ONLY for our SPOT STUFF Supporters....

SPOT STUFF will only be available first to our supporters on Indiegogo! 

Supporters of Our Indiegogo campaign who contribute to fund the infrastructure necessary to bring SPOT STUFF to the market will receive the first shipments of SPOT STUFF prior to release to the general public through any other retail or web outlets


SPOT STUFF Challenges!

We have spent years on research and testing of SPOT STUFF and we are so close to getting this amazing product out to everyone's home office, car, boat, backpack, purse and suitcase......WE JUST NEED YOUR HELP!!! 

So please take a peek at our PERKS.....find one that's a perfect match for you and contribute! Then please take the time to help us by letting all your friends know about our Indiegogo campaign and SPOT STUFF! visit


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can help SPOT STUFF get started with a $$ contribution...........But you can still help us in a big way!!!! 

Please TELL ALL YOUR FRIENDS ABOUT OUR CAMPAIGN!!

It's easy just use the Indiegogo share tools to quickly tell them.......  and maybe they will return the favor by including you in the SPOT STUFF Family and Friends Perk so you can try it after all! 

Thank you so much for taking the time to help us get going!!


The SPOT STUFF Team

The innovative SPOT STUFF Team is comprised of professionals experienced in Technology, Chemistry, Branding, Design, Manufacturing, Marketing and Sales and we’re so excited to bring our first product to the market!  

               

  Contact us at:  www.SpotStuff.com
