story:
Must we continue as we are? If you think it’s time for a new leadership narrative - for a new "1%' to step forward - then here’s your chance to help make sure that happens.


For over 20 years, hundreds of accomplished individuals from around the world - business people, teachers/academics, artist/performers, NPO/NGO leaders and more - have gathered to discuss how to leverage our expertise and resources for the making of a better planet. We have done so with the shared conviction that exponential advances in technology will continue to profoundly reshape the human condition in all arenas – social, economic, political, environmental, spiritual and security.

Out of this chaos of disruption, an age of abundance is within our grasp. Such an age promises to liberate humanity so that we might seize the fullest potential of the human spirit and intellect.

But it threatens too.

It gives life to forces of ignorance and reaction that too often find comfort in simplistic solutions. We believe we are facing a pivot point in history – one path leading to enlightened possibilities, the other to dystopian certainty.

The tools to render a bountiful world for the benefit of all exist today. What prevents its realization is a systemic lack of leadership. However, we believe that a global cohort of leaders does exist who by virtue of the works that they have created are exemplars, and that if made a community, together have the power and potential to ensure that the destiny of enlightened possibilities is the path humanity elects to take. 

We call them Renaissance Leaders.

A Renaissance Leader is...
  • A high integrity individual with sensitive self-awareness and a passion for advancing their enterprise, their community and the world. 
  • A creator with a sense of history and the capacity to see the world holistically, to practice systems thinking, to inject a global and a future perspective into present challenges, to honour diversity, and to draw on ideas and best practices from diverse disciplines and economic sectors. 
  • A leader who demonstrate the ability to take input from these various disciplines, synthesize it and integrate it for application to a specific situation. 
  • An exemplar who demonstrates grace under pressure, and inspires others to have the courage to collaborate and innovate in order to dramatically improve enterprise or community performance. 
The Renaissance Expedition is...

A movement which is committed to identify, connect, mentor and promote the efforts of a diverse community of change leaders with similar values and strategic intentions whose purpose is improving individual, organizational, community and global performance.
 
The Objective of the
          Renaissance Expedition (REX)...

To create a movement that identifies, engages and mobilizes the global cohort of leader/creators who share a common value system and sense of shared destiny - the new "1%' of those uniquely positioned to change the leadership narrative.  A group committed to start impacting systemic global change in just three years.  We will do so by recruiting, supporting and promoting the elevation of no fewer than 20,000 REx members by 2018, and 100,000 by 2020, to positions of domain influence and power - to insert and nurture a new ‘renaissance’ leadership gene into the global DNA from class-room to boardroom to legislature.

Our Charter...

We believe in a world of abundance where we are each held to be responsible for, and accountable to, ourselves. Thus empowered, we are obligated to conduct ourselves so as to better enable a future where in spirit and practice;
  • All citizens are equal before the law.
  • All citizens have access to, and enjoy the same voting rights. 
  • Discrimination, prejudice and violence are not tolerated.
  • All citizens are free to express themselves as they wish, without threat, harm or repercussion.
  • All citizens have the right to, and enjoyment of, personal security and property protection.
  • All citizens have access to, and enjoy the same right to privacy.
  • All citizens have access to nutritious and affordable food, clean water and clean air.
  • All citizens have access to such education as is necessary to realize one's wants, needs and desires.
  • All citizens have access to healthcare that provides for a long and well-lived life. 
  • All citizens can pursue a livelihood that provides for, a productive, accomplished and rewarding life, lived with dignity. 
  • For those who cannot provide for themselves, access to such means as allows for a life that is as productive, accomplished and rewarding as their circumsatnce allows for, lived with dignity. 
  • The natural world, including species and eco-systems, are valued and respected.
  • We ALL endeavour to lead by example. 
    •

Member Engagement

The leader-creators among us are successful because they have ideas, are passionate about achievement and care about our world. REX membership will give them a voice, both globally and locally.

Here’s how.

The viral growth and ultimate success of REX will be determined by the effectiveness of global theme-specific ‘Missions’ launched and hosted on the REX community platform (renaissance-expedition.org) and local ‘Salons’ that will establish a physical footprint for REX wherever a critical mass of members is established. Both channels will be volunteer run, with self-service support provided by REX through the community platform. Both channels will encourage members to discuss, elevate and pursue actions consistent with the Charter. Over time, as membership grows, these channels will become the means by which programs will be developed to foster, support, fund and otherwise advance REX initiatives through purpose-specific charitable foundations.



Note that a key differentiator is the role of self-interest. It is held to be a truism that viral growth can only be achieved by addressing the ‘what’s in it for me’ challenge. We believe that enlightened self-interest MUST be reconciled with the adoption of the REX Charter. Accordingly, both channels will provide opportunities for members to do business with (and/or otherwise support) one another consistent with the Charter with the view that doing so is ultimately to the advantage of all. 
See 'The Details'  below for further information. 

  What You get

By being a Founding Contributor, you are demonstrating your belief in the REX Charter – what it holds to be true and the purpose it aspires too - and your conviction that there is a systemic deficit at a time when the global leadership narrative needs a fix. Your contribution will be a first critical foundation stone of a movement that could change the world.

You will also be the co-creator of a community of like minded peers committed to supporting and promoting you/your enterprise in the pursuit of your goals and objectives - locally and globally!

And, as we've noted, the money helps, but for many of the Perks on the right we are genuinely interested in knowing who you think we should be targeting for membership, helping us, funding us and otherwise working with us. Your engagement will literally help shape us.

  How Will We Use Your Contribution?

We are converting a group of hundreds of accomplished individuals to a movement of thousands. That means establishing a not-for-profit organization and getting it ready to be the scaffolding for REX. We welcome your financial support now, as a Founding Contributor, per the 'Perks' options to the right. 

Our immediate needs/goals:
  • Start-up legal, administrative and marketing costs.
  • Design work and customization of community platform/website, including CRM integration for November 1st 'live' date.
    • Engagement of a Webmaster and Community Manager(s) 
  • Commence recruiting of first Salon leaders - target date for first 'live' salons - January 2016.
  • Commence recruiting of first Mission leaders - target date for first 'live' Missions February 2016.
  • Nominal honorariums to start-up team members.
  • Start-up travel expenses for start-up team members.
  • To give us the runway necessary to secure benefactor support and/or sponsorships.
We promise to be responsible with your money - we are very good at being thrifty.

Each dollar you contribute is a vote for the Renaissance Expedition Charter, and demonstrates to prospective sponsors and benefactors that we are a growing and significant movement with impact – one worth supporting.

Other Ways You Can Help

The thing about a movement is that it needs - well, movement. If you have made it this far down, it's likely you are a believer in our Expedition. Whether you have been able to contribute or not, you can help us tremendously by forwarding the link to this campaign along to as many of your friends, family and colleagues as you think would be flattered to receive it. And movement is about noise - social media noise. The more you share, post, or re-post on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterist, Google +, Instagram or any other platforms (or combination thereof), the more we get the word out. Go ahead, make some noise!

We will also be looking for help from professional services organizations and/or freelancers and interns (on a pro-bono basis initially) for community management, fundraising strategy/execution, and NPO operations - including office space.  If you have the expertise, time and resource, and believe in the Charter and want to help make it happen, we'd love to hear from you!

And finally, if you are interested in being a founder of a Salon, or a thought leader for one of our Missions, please reach out to us via the 'Contact' link to the bottom right of the video above.

Join our LinkedIn group and keep in touch.

The Team

Bob Westrope
Executive Director
59 year old consultant,
entrepreneur, coach and mentor.
Bob's LinkedIn Profile 
Bob’s personal website 		Don Simpson
Founder & Chief Explorer
81 year old iconic citizen of the world.
Don's LinkedIn Profile            
Don’s personal website




Some of our REX Exemplars...

Eric Beynon President
 Sustainable Growth Co.
Casey Bridgeford Founder OnCastMedia
John Bromley Founder & CEO Chimp
Eddie Bullen Owner Thunder Dome Sound
Dr. Robert Church Retired Order of Canada
Jennifer Corriero Executive Director TakingITGlobal 
Jean Michel Dissard Director/Producer I LEARN AMERICA
Dr. Alex Jadad Interim Director Institute for Global Health Equity & Innovation
Doug James President & CEO VerdantGlobal
Jamil Jivani Professor Osgoode Hall Law School
David Kincaid Founder LEVEL 5
Caroline Kisia Executive Director Action Africa Help International
Sonja Miokovic Co-Founder  Youthful Cities
Stephen Murgatroyd President & CEO futureTHINK Press
John B. Rogers Jr. CEO Local Motors
Abdullah Saleh Founder ICChange
Dr. Hawthorne 'Hawk' Smith Clinical Director Bellevue/NYU Program
for Survivors of Torture
Kali D. Taylor Co-Founder Student Energy
John Waibochi Founder & CEO Virtual City

See also photos in the 'Gallery' section above.

The Details

First Principles

  • In an age of abundance, self-interest and societal interest need no longer be in conflict. While enlightened self-interest lies at the heart of discovery, innovation and creation, its application is best nurtured and rewarded within a healthy, vibrant, affluent community.
  • We must lead by example. The REX community must attract, empower and mobilize members who understand the dynamics of collective strength and actions.
  • Its members are all ‘leader creators’ - those who are distinguished for having created and/or run private, public or not-for-profit enterprises, or those who are viewed as accomplished contributors to the arts, sciences, humanities and/or social discourse.
  • REX is a self-sustaining movement, an evolving eco-system that will define the objectives and determine the outcomes – from the bottom-up, not the top-down.
  • Accordingly, REX will provide the ‘North Star’ of the movement – our Charter - the aspirational scaffolding needed to empower the community we recruit. Our strength is in the constant pursuit of the promise and potential of the Charter by the network we build and mobilize.
  • REX must strive to be as philosophically agnostic/secular as possible – an impactful centrist movement that rejects and is a counter-force to the deceptively seductive alternatives offered by ideologues and extremists on either side of the political spectrum.
  • Recognizing that the need for leadership is systemic, it is thus global, multi-sectoral and especially, multi-generational.
  • A foundational value of REX is that its members commit to help each other to achieve professional success and thus secure positions of influence and power within their domain - to be remarkable human beings and thus be makers and enablers of exceptional communities/societies through peer networking, coaching and purposeful collaboration, regardless of background or skill set.
Missions 

The impact of REX will be manifested in the ‘Missions’ that it launches and presents to its membership and the world. The name is used in the diplomatic/political sense, and describes horizontal streams that cut across Salon membership, creating global communities of interest, expertise and commitment – led by recognized thought leaders. 

The Missions of the Renaissance Expedition will each serve to frame the community’s objectives, initiatives and requisite outcomes with the purpose of provoking a demonstrable shift in the global leadership narrative by 2020, consistent with the spirit and substance of the Charter. They will ultimately do so in the following theatres;
  • Arts & Culture
  • Coaching, Mentoring & Facilitating
  • Education
  • Governance
  • Health & Wellness
  • Human Capital
  • Justice & Law
  • Media
  • Philanthropy & Social Responsibility
  • Science & Technology
  • Security
  • Spirituality
  • Sports & Entertainment
  • Sustainability & The Environment
  • Wealth Making & Distribution
The Missions' objectives are to;
  • Create a global cohort of exemplars that by their growing numbers and achievements and subject matter interest attracts qualified membership to the REX Community
  • Provide a professional networking opportunity for Members.
  • Provide theatre-specific thought leadership consistent with the Charter.
  • Lead the setting of Mission objectives, and the design and execution of initiatives and programs to secure said objectives consistent with the Charter.
  • Qualified initiatives and programs would include (but would not be limited too);
    • Projects that directly recognize, encourage and support the development of Renaissance Leadership.
    • Projects that by their impact and example promote the values of Renaissance Leadership.
    • Projects that otherwise bias for success efforts to build the world envisioned in the Charter
    • Liaise and interact with Salons if, when and as appropriate.
      • For example, having the ‘Education’ Mission work with Salon sponsored local scholarship/mentoring initiatives.
It is important to note that all REX members will be automatically enrolled in the Coaching, Mentoring and Facilitating Mission, given it's importance.  Accordingly, each member will be expected to provide and profit from, at least 2 hours of cross-mentoring each month with a relevant dyad partner.

Salons

The Salons of the Renaissance Expedition will each serve to frame the community’s objectives, initiatives and desired outcomes with the purpose of provoking a demonstrable shift in the local, geographically-focused leadership narrative by 2020, consistent with the spirit and substance of the Charter. The objectives are to; 
  • Create and engage a local cohort of exemplars that by their growing numbers and achievements attracts qualified membership to the REX Community
  • Provide a socialization and professional networking opportunity for Members
  • Lead the setting of Salon objectives, and the design and execution of initiatives and programs to secure said objectives.
  • Qualified initiatives and programs include (but are not limited too);
    • Projects that directly recognize, encourage and support the development of Renaissance Leadership.
    • Projects that by their impact and example promote the values of Renaissance Leadership.
    • Projects that otherwise bias for success efforts to build the world envisioned in the Charter.
    • Liaise and interact with other Salons and/or Missions if, when and as, appropriate.
Salons will be self-forming wherever a critical mass of members exist, supported and administered by self-service tools on the REX community platform. Utilizing a proven formula, the principle member engagement event will be a monthly meeting of up to 30 participants. The agenda for a Salon would look like the following:
  • Private dining room secured for monthly meetings at restaurant
  • Same day/time/venue each month - 6:00pm to 9:30pm
  • Drinks, introductions
  • Member presentation – member presents their enterprise/interest – networking opportunity
  • Main event - Dinner presentation and Discussion
    • Host selected speaker speaks to a REX theme/Salon project

The Risks & Challenges

We are an odd kind of start-up - a non-profit-organization with veteran management, a 20-year legacy and the experience and commitment of hundreds of accomplished members from around the world to draw on. But of course there are risks. Some to consider:

  • We might not raise enough here to launch the Expedition through this campaign. Or, we might raise enough now, and not be able to leverage that by raising additional funds later, and/or developing new revenue streams.
  • We might find, despite our experience to date, that the concept of the Renaissance Expedition simply doesn't resonate with you, or enough people like you. If a critical mass of you don't agree with our value proposition, we won’t succeed.
  • Yes, it's true - execution is everything. If not everything, then a lot. You can have a great idea with lousy execution. It's possible that's us.
  • There are a lot of very good organizations/causes competing for your money and attention, with only so much of either to go around.
There are a few good reasons why we might fail, but there are already hundreds why we will succeed. 


Terms & Conditions

    Given that we are a new start-up with few resources, we need to keep our fulfillment commitments and costs as low as possible - we hope you appreciate this. This means that we might be a bit slower than we'd like getting back to you depending on the scale and scope the response. BUT WE WILL GET BACK TO YOU.

    With respect to all of the 'Nominate', 'Acknowledge' and 'Share' Perks (Share Your REX Hero, Nominate a Member, Acknowledge an Enterprise, Nominate a Mission Leader, Nominate a Sponsor and Nominate a Board Member), we will take your nomination as a suggestion only. There is no commitment on our part to accept the nomination you make, though we do commit to consider very seriously all nominations for qualified candidates made for recruitment purposes. A qualified candidate (either individual or corporate) is one whose actions suggest they believe in the Charter, and have the qualities of Renaissance Leader as described above. 

    With respect to 'Apply to be a Pathfinder Member',  'Apply for 2-4-1 Membership' and 'Apply for Lifetime Membership', we will contact you through the email address you provide to start the application process. Given that membership is normally by invitation, we will ask you for some evidence (LinkedIn profile, member referral, website etc.) of the nature of your accomplishments. In the event you are not accepted, your contribution will be refunded by check or wire transfer.  Note that once the member cohorts are formed they will be consulted as to how best differentiate the price/value difference between them.

    With respect to the 'Signed Innovation Manifesto', we will contact you by email to secure the full name to be included in Don's autograph.  The 11" x 17" print will be shipped by first class postage in a protective cardboard tube commencing in October/November 2015.

    With respect to 'Dinner with Don for Two', you will be contacted by email to arrange a convenient date to book a dinner (or lunch) in Toronto at a restaurant of Don's choosing, commencing in November 2015.  Please note that travel and accommodation costs are NOT included. 

    With respect to '10 Hours of Mentoring from Don', you will be contacted by email to arrange a convenient date to commence the engagement.  Don reserves the right to accept or decline the engagement - in the event he does decline, the funds in full will be refunded by check or wire transfer. The engagement shall be provided in Toronto and/or by phone, commencing in November of 2015.  Any requisite travel and accommodation costs borne by Don as mutually agreed, are not included.

    With respect to 'Become a Pathfinder, Explorers or Chief Explorers Funder', your membership application must be accepted per the  'Apply for 2-4-1 Membership' and/or 'Apply for Lifetime Membership' Perks noted above.  Accordingly, you will be contacted by email to start the application process. Given that membership is normally by invitation, we will ask you for some evidence (LinkedIn profile, member referral, website etc.) of the nature of your accomplishments. In the event you are not accepted, your contribution will be refunded by check or wire transfer.

    The Renaissance Expedition is a federally registered non-profit organization based in Toronto Canada.  Note that it does not currently enjoy charitable status - therefore contributions are not tax deductible.

  The Renaissance Expedition is...A movement which is committed to identify, connect, mentor and promote the efforts of a diverse community of change leaders with similar values and strategic intentions whose purpose is improving individual, organizational, community and global performance.
 


  The Objective of the           Renaissance Expedition (REX)...
To create a movement that identifies, engages and mobilizes the global cohort of leader/creators who share a common value system and sense of shared destiny - the new "1%' of those uniquely positioned to change the leadership narrative.  A group committed to start impacting systemic global change in just three years.  We will do so by recruiting, supporting and promoting the elevation of no fewer than 20,000 REx members by 2018, and 100,000 by 2020, to positions of domain influence and power - to insert and nurture a new ‘renaissance’ leadership gene into the global DNA from class-room to boardroom to legislature.



  Our Charter...


We believe in a world of abundance where we are each held to be responsible for, and accountable to, ourselves. Thus empowered, we are obligated to conduct ourselves so as to better enable a future where in spirit and practice;

All citizens are equal before the law.
All citizens have access to, and enjoy the same voting rights. 
Discrimination, prejudice and violence are not tolerated.
All citizens are free to express themselves as they wish, without threat, harm or repercussion.
All citizens have the right to, and enjoyment of, personal security and property protection. 

All citizens have access to, and enjoy the same right to privacy.
All citizens have access to nutritious and affordable food, clean water and clean air.
All citizens have access to such education as is necessary to realize one's wants, needs and desires. 

All citizens have access to healthcare that provides for a long and well-lived life. 

All citizens can pursue a livelihood that provides for, a productive, accomplished and rewarding life, lived with dignity. 

For those who cannot provide for themselves, access to such means as allows for a life that is as productive, accomplished and rewarding as their circumsatnce allows for, lived with dignity. 

The natural world, including species and eco-systems, are valued and respected.

We ALL endeavour to lead by example. 






  Member Engagement

The leader-creators among us are successful because they have ideas, are passionate about achievement and care about our world. REX membership will give them a voice, both globally and locally.
Here’s how.The viral growth and ultimate success of REX will be determined by the effectiveness of global theme-specific ‘Missions’ launched and hosted on the REX community platform (renaissance-expedition.org) and local ‘Salons’ that will establish a physical footprint for REX wherever a critical mass of members is established.

Both channels will be volunteer run, with self-service support provided by REX through the community platform. Both channels will encourage members to discuss, elevate and pursue actions consistent with the Charter. Over time, as membership grows, these channels will become the means by which programs will be developed to foster, support, fund and otherwise advance REX initiatives through purpose-specific charitable foundations.


Note that a key differentiator is the role of self-interest. It is held to be a truism that viral growth can only be achieved by addressing the ‘what’s in it for me’ challenge. We believe that enlightened self-interest MUST be reconciled with the adoption of the REX Charter. Accordingly, both channels will provide opportunities for members to do business with (and/or otherwise support) one another consistent with the Charter with the view that doing so is ultimately to the advantage of all. 
See 'The Details'  below for further information.   


  What You get

By being a Founding Contributor, you are demonstrating your 
belief in the REX Charter – what it holds to be true and the purpose it 
aspires too - and your conviction that there is a systemic deficit at a 
time when the global leadership narrative needs a fix. Your contribution
 will be a first critical foundation stone of a movement that could 
change the world.

You will also be the co-creator of a community of like minded peers committed to supporting and promoting you/your enterprise in the pursuit of your goals and objectives - locally and globally!And, as we've noted, the money helps, but for many of the Perks on 
the right we are genuinely interested in knowing who you think we should
 be targeting for membership, helping us, funding us and otherwise 
working with us. Your engagement will literally help shape us.

 


  How Will We Use Your Contribution?

We are converting a group of hundreds of accomplished 
individuals to a movement of thousands. That means establishing a 
not-for-profit organization and getting it ready to be the scaffolding 
for REX. We welcome your financial support now, as a Founding 
Contributor, per the 'Perks' options to the right.  Our immediate 
needs/goals:

Start-up legal, administrative and marketing costs.
Design work and customization of community platform/website, including CRM integration for November 1st 'live' date.

Engagement of a Webmaster and Community Manager(s) 
Commence recruiting of first Salon leaders - target date for first 'live' salons - January 2016.

Commence recruiting of first Mission leaders - target date for first 'live' Missions February 2016.

Nominal honorariums to start-up team members.
Start-up travel expenses for start-up team members.
To give us the runway necessary to secure benefactor support and/or sponsorships.

We promise to be responsible with your money - we are very good at being thrifty.

Each dollar you contribute is a vote for the Renaissance 
Expedition Charter, and demonstrates to prospective sponsors and 
benefactors that we are a growing and significant movement with impact –
 one worth supporting.


  Other Ways You Can Help

The thing about a movement is that it needs - well, movement. If
 you have made it this far down, it's likely you are a believer in our 
Expedition. Whether you have been able to contribute or not, you can 
help us tremendously by forwarding the link to this campaign along to as
 many of your friends, family and colleagues as you think would be 
flattered to receive it. And movement is about noise - social media 
noise. The more you share, post, or re-post on Twitter, Facebook, 
LinkedIn, Pinterist, Google +, Instagram or any other platforms (or 
combination thereof), the more we get the word out. Go ahead, make some 
noise!
We will also be looking for help from professional services 
organizations and/or freelancers and interns (on a pro-bono basis 
initially) for community management, fundraising strategy/execution, and
 NPO operations - including office space.  If you have the expertise, 
time and resource, and believe in the Charter and want to help make it happen, we'd love to hear from you!And finally, if you are interested in being a founder of a Salon, or a thought leader for one of our Missions, please reach out to us via the 'Contact' link to the bottom right of the video above.Join our LinkedIn group and keep in touch.



 The Team













Bob Westrope Executive Director 59 year old consultant, entrepreneur, coach and mentor.
Bob's LinkedIn Profile Bob’s personal website


Don SimpsonFounder & Chief Explorer81 year old iconic citizen of the world.

Don's LinkedIn Profile             Don’s personal website 






 Some of our REX Exemplars...





Eric Beynon
President

Sustainable Growth Co.



Casey Bridgeford
Founder
OnCastMedia


John Bromley
 Founder & CEO
Chimp



Eddie Bullen
Owner
Thunder Dome Sound


Dr. Robert Church
Retired
Order of Canada


Jennifer Corriero
Executive Director
TakingITGlobal 


Jean Michel Dissard
Director/Producer
I LEARN AMERICA


Dr. Alex Jadad
Interim Director
Institute for Global Health Equity & Innovation


Doug James
President & CEO
VerdantGlobal


 Jamil Jivani
Professor
Osgoode Hall Law School


David Kincaid
Founder
LEVEL 5


Caroline Kisia
Executive Director
Action Africa Help International


Sonja Miokovic
Co-Founder 
Youthful Cities


Stephen Murgatroyd
President & CEO
futureTHINK Press


John B. Rogers Jr.
CEO
Local Motors


Abdullah Saleh
Founder
ICChange


Dr. Hawthorne 'Hawk' Smith
Clinical Director
Bellevue/NYU Program for Survivors of Torture


Kali D. Taylor
Co-Founder
Student Energy


John Waibochi
Founder & CEO
Virtual City



See also photos in the 'Gallery' section above.


  The Details


First Principles
In an age of abundance, self-interest and societal interest need
 no longer be in conflict. While enlightened self-interest lies at the 
heart of discovery, innovation and creation, its application is best 
nurtured and rewarded within a healthy, vibrant, affluent community.

We must lead by example. The REX community must attract, empower and
 mobilize members who understand the dynamics of collective strength and
 actions.
Its members are all ‘leader creators’ - those who are distinguished 
for having created and/or run private, public or not-for-profit 
enterprises, or those who are viewed as accomplished contributors to the
 arts, sciences, humanities and/or social discourse.
REX is a self-sustaining movement, an evolving eco-system that will 
define the objectives and determine the outcomes – from the bottom-up, 
not the top-down.
Accordingly, REX will provide the ‘North Star’ of the movement 
– our Charter - the aspirational scaffolding needed to empower the 
community we recruit. Our strength is in the constant pursuit of the 
promise and potential of the Charter by the network we build and 
mobilize.
REX must strive to be as philosophically agnostic/secular as 
possible – an impactful centrist movement that rejects and is a 
counter-force to the deceptively seductive alternatives offered by 
ideologues and extremists on either side of the political spectrum.
Recognizing that the need for leadership is systemic, it is thus global, multi-sectoral and especially, multi-generational.
A foundational value of REX is that its members commit to help each 
other to achieve professional success and thus secure positions of 
influence and power within their domain - to be remarkable human beings 
and thus be makers and enablers of exceptional communities/societies 
through peer networking, coaching and purposeful collaboration, 
regardless of background or skill set.

Missions The impact of REX will be manifested in the ‘Missions’ that it launches and presents to its membership and the world. The name is used in the diplomatic/political sense, and describes horizontal streams that cut across Salon membership, creating global communities of interest, expertise and commitment – led by recognized thought leaders. The Missions of the Renaissance Expedition will each serve to frame the community’s objectives, initiatives and requisite outcomes with the purpose of provoking a demonstrable shift in the global leadership narrative by 2020, consistent with the spirit and substance of the Charter. They will ultimately do so in the following theatres;
Arts & Culture
Coaching, Mentoring & Facilitating
Education
Governance
Health & Wellness
Human Capital
Justice & Law
Media
Philanthropy & Social Responsibility
Science & Technology
Security
Spirituality
Sports & Entertainment
Sustainability & The Environment
Wealth Making & Distribution
The Missions' objectives are to;
Create a global cohort of exemplars that by their growing numbers and achievements and subject matter interest attracts qualified membership to the REX Community
Provide a professional networking opportunity for Members.
Provide theatre-specific thought leadership consistent with the Charter.
Lead the setting of Mission objectives, and the design and execution of initiatives and programs to secure said objectives consistent with the Charter.
Qualified initiatives and programs would include (but would not be limited too);
Projects that directly recognize, encourage and support the development of Renaissance Leadership.
Projects that by their impact and example promote the values of Renaissance Leadership.
Projects that otherwise bias for success efforts to build the world envisioned in the Charter
Liaise and interact with Salons if, when and as appropriate.For example, having the ‘Education’ Mission work with Salon sponsored local scholarship/mentoring initiatives.



It is important to note that all REX members will be automatically enrolled in the Coaching, Mentoring and Facilitating Mission, given it's importance.  Accordingly, each member will be expected to provide and profit from, at least 2 hours of cross-mentoring each month with a relevant dyad partner.Salons The Salons of the Renaissance Expedition will each serve to frame the community’s objectives, initiatives and desired outcomes with the purpose of provoking a demonstrable shift in the local, geographically-focused leadership narrative by 2020, consistent with the spirit and substance of the Charter. The objectives are to; 
Create and engage a local cohort of exemplars that by their growing numbers and achievements attracts qualified membership to the REX Community
Provide a socialization and professional networking opportunity for Members
Lead the setting of Salon objectives, and the design and execution of initiatives and programs to secure said objectives.
Qualified initiatives and programs include (but are not limited too);
Projects that directly recognize, encourage and support the development of Renaissance Leadership.
Projects that by their impact and example promote the values of Renaissance Leadership.
Projects that otherwise bias for success efforts to build the world envisioned in the Charter.
Liaise and interact with other Salons and/or Missions if, when and as, appropriate.


Salons will be self-forming wherever a critical mass of members exist, supported and administered by self-service tools on the REX community platform. Utilizing a proven formula, the principle member engagement event will be a monthly meeting of up to 30 participants. The agenda for a Salon would look like the following:
Private dining room secured for monthly meetings at restaurant
Same day/time/venue each month - 6:00pm to 9:30pm
Drinks, introductions
Member presentation – member presents their enterprise/interest – networking opportunity
Main event - Dinner presentation and DiscussionHost selected speaker speaks to a REX theme/Salon project





  The Risks & Challenges

We are an odd kind of start-up - a non-profit-organization with 
veteran management, a 20-year legacy and the experience and commitment 
of hundreds of accomplished members from around the world to draw on.

But of course there are risks. Some to consider:


We might not raise enough here to launch the Expedition through 
this campaign. Or, we might raise enough now, and not be able to 
leverage that by raising additional funds later, and/or developing new 
revenue streams.
We might find, despite our experience to date, that the concept of 
the Renaissance Expedition simply doesn't resonate with you, or enough 
people like you. If a critical mass of you don't agree with our value 
proposition, we won’t succeed.
Yes, it's true - execution is everything. If not everything, then a
 lot. You can have a great idea with lousy execution. It's possible 
that's us.
There are a lot of very good organizations/causes competing for 
your money and attention, with only so much of either to go around.

There are a few good reasons why we might fail, but there are already hundreds why we will succeed. 







  Terms & Conditions


Given that we are a new start-up with few resources, we need to keep our fulfillment commitments and costs as low as possible - we hope you appreciate this.

This means that we might be a bit slower than we'd like getting back to you depending on the scale and scope the response. BUT WE WILL GET BACK TO YOU.With respect to all of the 'Nominate', 'Acknowledge' and 'Share' Perks (Share Your REX Hero, Nominate a Member, Acknowledge an Enterprise, Nominate a Mission Leader, Nominate a Sponsor and Nominate a Board Member), we will take your nomination as a suggestion only. There is no commitment on our part to accept the nomination you make, though we do commit to consider very seriously all nominations for qualified candidates made for recruitment purposes. A qualified candidate (either individual or corporate) is one whose actions suggest they believe in the Charter, and have the qualities of Renaissance Leader as described above. 

With respect to 'Apply to be a Pathfinder Member',  'Apply for 2-4-1 Membership' and 'Apply for Lifetime Membership', we will contact you through the email address you provide to start the application process. Given that membership is normally by invitation, we will ask you for some evidence (LinkedIn profile, member referral, website etc.) of the nature of your accomplishments. In the event you are not accepted, your contribution will be refunded by check or wire transfer. 

Note that once the member cohorts are formed they will be consulted as to how best differentiate the price/value difference between them.With respect to the 'Signed Innovation Manifesto', we will contact you by email to secure the full name to be included in Don's autograph.  The 11" x 17" print will be shipped by first class postage in a protective cardboard tube commencing in October/November 2015.With respect to 'Dinner with Don for Two', you will be contacted by email to arrange a convenient date to book a dinner (or lunch) in Toronto at a restaurant of Don's choosing, commencing in November 2015.  Please note that travel and accommodation costs are NOT included.  With respect to '10 Hours of Mentoring from Don', you will be contacted by email to arrange a convenient date to commence the engagement.  Don reserves the right to accept or decline the engagement - in the event he does decline, the funds in full will be refunded by check or wire transfer. The engagement shall be provided in Toronto and/or by phone, commencing in November of 2015.  Any requisite travel and accommodation costs borne by Don as mutually agreed, are not included.With respect to 'Become a Pathfinder, Explorers or Chief Explorers Funder', your membership application must be accepted per the  'Apply for 2-4-1 Membership' and/or 'Apply for Lifetime Membership' Perks noted above.  Accordingly, you will be contacted by email to start the application process. Given that membership is normally by 
invitation, we will ask you for some evidence (LinkedIn profile, member 
referral, website etc.) of the nature of your accomplishments. In the 
event you are not accepted, your contribution will be refunded by check 
or wire transfer.
The Renaissance Expedition is a federally registered non-profit organization based in Toronto Canada.  Note that it does not currently enjoy charitable status - therefore contributions are not tax deductible.

story:
Hi folks thanks for reading. Since 2009 I have dedicated my life to raising awareness of how gambling is getting out of control in our society and the social consequences of it.
It hasn't been an easy journey!

The Neuroliberation campaign started out to tackle the 'gambling act 2005' which meant that lots of our community shops are now being taken over by betting shops and lots of innocent people are being affected it by through crime ect.

The real genuine change that needs to happen (and actually is slowly thanks to this and similar campaigns) is that we need to change perception. Often it's simply about reminding people simple facts or boosted peoples education.
Betting shops are everywhere, online gambling is rife, government profit from it, health research is corrupt and our society is going down the drain.

Not many people are aware this is actually happening though, even though often it is right infront of their very eyes....a lot of people even believe there is no problem, and can you blame them with the amount of pro-gambling propaganda out there?

But we are here to change that, educate and empower people, challenge industries and make a change.

We don't claim to solve and rid the world of all it's problems, but with your help we can certainly be one of those cogs in the machine that can make change behind the scenes. It doesn't matter if we don't get any credit by the end of it, we'l have done our job and changed minds.

Sooo , here's the crunch and the whole point of the fundraiser... we need a DVD duplicator as well as other materials in order to give out our digital campaign packs.... these consist ofour educational films (already produced) , lots of eye-opening research, and tips on how people can themselves easily and effortlessly help contribute to making change.

The campaign is ran and managed by me, Ben Thacker (aka Ben Westwood).. for six years I have worked tirelessly on this , all with a total outside donations pot of around £200 (although we have received some DVD donations recently for this project, thanks peeps)

Achievements of the campaign to date are as follows.

- Blog visitors everyday
-Awareness raised to people on almost daily basis via social media
- Heaps of radio interviews on this subject and the campaign
- Campaign founder featured on 4thought TV
- Featured on the 'What's up show' aired on Pick TV
- 2 grassroots documentaries produced and shared on social media

Current aims and petitions.

Currently we are tackling Kellogg's over their bandit machine branding cereal 'Krave Choco Roulette' and are planning to tackle Dorito's over their blatant Roulette casino advertising campaigns.
But we need your help to get this campaign bigger to educate people and get more onboard.

Depending on how fundraising goes...if we achieve more than our target...big smiles all round and full steam ahead!

What we need DVD duplicator which we can get for £250 or even less. Otherwise I If we can get a decent quality one for less with a warranty we'll do that. Any surplus money will be spend on disks, petitions, stickers ect which will be sent out to people... if you have donated then please contact the campaign and a pack will be sent to you asap.

Without a disk duplicator this idea can't really be done, as it wont take long for laptops to break as it's not just the disk drive we'd need to worry about but also the processors.

A cheap second hand printer we can get cheap or free, with inks ect...that would really speed the campaign up bigtime! Stickers and other materials also.

£600 is a really low target and in the long run we'll need more but for now, look what's been achieved from only £200 outside donations!! ... although after six years I'm getting older and after £1000's of my own money spent on this (and having never been abroad yet in my life when I could have) I hope I have proved my dedication to this. 

With your help we can do this.
Thanks for reading.

Ben Thacker,
Neuroliberation campaign

http://neuroliberation.blogspot.com
http://facebook.com/neuroliberationcampaign

https://www.change.org/p/kellogg-stop-selling-kelloggs-krave-choco-roulette-and-gambling-related-marketing

story:
Who are we? / ¿Quiénes somos?


We are a team of professionals who have worked together for more than eight years in the Caribbean region of Colombia. After closely monitoring the needs of the people, we noted the great impact that the internal armed conflict has had on their lives, leaving thousands in poverty and exclusion. For this motive, we have decided to create the Manzana Roja Foundation, with the aim of contributing to economic and social welfare in our country.

Somos un equipo de profesionales de diversas áreas sociales y de todas las edades que ha trabajado unido por más de ocho años en la región del Caribe Colombiano. Luego de monitorear muy de cerca las necesidades de la población, notamos el gran impacto que el conflicto armado interno ha tenido sobre sus vidas, dejando a miles de personas en situación de pobreza y exclusión. Por este motivo, hemos decidido crear la Fundación Manzana Roja, con miras a contribuir al bienestar económico y social.

(Picture: From left to right, Hernán Borrero (internationalist), Marieth Martínez (administrative assistant), Julieta Camacho (lawyer), Gonzalo Borrero (economist), Camilo Moreno (lawyer), Kathy Herrera (business administrator), José Serrano (student of business administration).


What do we do? / ¿Qué hacemos?

The Manzana Roja Foundation supports, through its socially responsible microcredits and juridical and financial guidance, the development of the different productive projects of people who have suffered directly or indirectly from the terrors of war, and who have not been able to escape from poverty due to the lack of access to the most elementary financial services.

La Fundación Manzana Roja apoya mediante sus microcréditos socialmente responsables y asesoría jurídica y financiera el desarrollo de los diferentes proyectos productivos de personas que han sufrido directa o indirectamente los flagelos de la guerra y que no han logrado escapar de la pobreza debido a la falta de acceso a los servicios financieros más elementales. 

(Picture: Coconut sweets seller)


Sustainability of your aid / Sostenibilidad de tu ayuda

Through its socially responsible microcredits –very small loans, at very low interest rates, with very high flexibility of payment, and appropriate and ethical means of collection–, the Manzana Roja Foundation grants the sustainability of the productive projects of the beneficiaries. This way, sustainability of your aid is assured, as well as the possibility of continuing the support of other people’s projects in the future.

A través de los microcréditos socialmente responsables –créditos de baja cuantía, muy baja tasa de interés, flexibilidad de pago y prácticas apropiadas y éticas de recaudo– la Fundación Manzana Roja garantiza la sostenibilidad de los proyectos productivos de los beneficiarios y, de ese modo, la sostenibilidad de tu aporte; permitiendo, así mismo, que más personas se beneficien con ella en el futuro.


Why support the Manzana Roja Foundation? / ¿Por qué apoyar a la Fundación Manzana Roja?

The Caribbean region of Colombia is one of the areas that have been more affected by the internal armed conflict, where the different manifestations of violence –such as forced displacement– have left thousands of people in poverty. All of which, added to the lack of access to the most elementary financial services, closes the opportunities of escaping from such condition. By supporting the Manzana Roja Foundation, you help to create new opportunities; and person by person, family by family, you contribute to the achievement of an enduring peace in Colombia.

El departamento del Magdalena, Colombia, es una de las regiones que han sido más afectadas por el conflicto armado interno, donde las diversas manifestaciones de violencia –tales como el desplazamiento forzado– han dejado a miles de personas en situación de pobreza. Ello, sumado a la falta de acceso a los servicios financieros más elementales, cierra las oportunidades para escapar a semejante condición. Al apoyar a la Fundación Manzana Roja, ayudas a crear nuevas oportunidades; y persona a persona, familia en familia, contribuyes a la construcción de una paz duradera en Colombia.


Where to find us? / ¿Dónde encontrarnos?


The Manzana Roja Foundation’s headquarters are located in the most antique city of continental America, Santa Marta, situated by the Caribbean Sea and the by foothills of the world’s highest littoral mountain formation, the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta.

La Fundación Manzana Roja tiene como base la ciudad de Santa Marta, el asentamiento más antiguo de América continental, ubicada frente al Mar Caribe y al pie de la montaña litoral más alta del mundo, la Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta.

(Picture: Fishing boats in Taganga, Santa Marta)

Contact us! / ¡Contáctanos! 

We can provide you with more detailed information. See our facebook page, send us an e-mail, or arrange with us a meeting through skype!

Podemos facilitarte información más detallada. ¡Entra a nuestra página facebook, envíanos un correo electrónico o pídenos una cita por skype!

(administrative assistant), Julieta Camacho (lawyer), Gonzalo Borrero (economist),
Camilo Moreno (lawyer), Kathy Herrera (business administrator), José Serrano (student
of business administration).What do we do? / ¿Qué hacemos?The Manzana Roja Foundation supports, through its socially responsible microcredits and juridical and financial guidance, the development of the different productive projects of people who have suffered directly or indirectly from the terrors of war, and who have not been able to escape from poverty due to the lack of access to the most elementary financial services.La Fundación Manzana Roja apoya mediante sus microcréditos
socialmente responsables y asesoría jurídica y financiera el desarrollo de los
diferentes proyectos productivos de personas que han sufrido directa o indirectamente los flagelos de la
guerra y que no han logrado escapar de la pobreza debido a la falta de acceso a
los servicios financieros más elementales. (Picture: Coconut sweets seller)Sustainability of your aid / Sostenibilidad de tu ayudaThrough its socially responsible microcredits –very small loans, at very low interest rates, with very high flexibility of payment, and appropriate and ethical means of collection–, the Manzana Roja Foundation grants the sustainability of the productive projects of the beneficiaries. This way, sustainability of your aid is assured, as well as the possibility of continuing the support of other people’s projects in the future.A través de los microcréditos socialmente responsables
–créditos de baja cuantía, muy baja tasa de interés, flexibilidad de pago y
prácticas apropiadas y éticas de recaudo– la Fundación Manzana Roja garantiza
la sostenibilidad de los proyectos productivos de los
beneficiarios y, de ese modo, la sostenibilidad de tu aporte; permitiendo, así
mismo, que más personas se beneficien con ella en el futuro.Why support the Manzana Roja Foundation? / ¿Por qué apoyar a la Fundación Manzana Roja?The Caribbean region of Colombia is one of the areas that have been more affected by the internal armed conflict, where the different manifestations of violence –such as forced displacement– have left thousands of people in poverty. All of which, added to the lack of access to the most elementary financial services, closes the opportunities of escaping from such condition. By supporting the Manzana Roja Foundation, you help to create new opportunities; and person by person, family by family, you contribute to the achievement of an enduring peace in Colombia. El departamento del
Magdalena, Colombia, es una de las regiones que han sido más afectadas por el
conflicto armado interno, donde las diversas manifestaciones de violencia –tales
como el desplazamiento forzado– han dejado a miles de personas en situación de
pobreza. Ello, sumado a la falta de acceso a los servicios financieros más
elementales, cierra las oportunidades para escapar a semejante condición. Al
apoyar a la Fundación Manzana Roja, ayudas a crear nuevas
oportunidades; y persona a persona, familia en familia, contribuyes a la
construcción de una paz duradera en Colombia.Where to find us? / ¿Dónde encontrarnos?The Manzana Roja Foundation’s headquarters are located in the most antique city of continental America, Santa Marta, situated by the Caribbean Sea and the by foothills of the world’s highest littoral mountain formation, the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta.La Fundación Manzana Roja tiene como base la ciudad de Santa Marta, el asentamiento más antiguo de
América continental, ubicada frente al Mar Caribe y al pie de la montaña
litoral más alta del mundo, la Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta.(Picture: Fishing boats in Taganga, Santa Marta)
Contact us! / ¡Contáctanos! 
We can provide you with more detailed information. See our facebook page, send us an e-mail, or arrange with us a meeting through skype!
Podemos facilitarte información más detallada. ¡Entra a nuestra página facebook, envíanos un correo electrónico o pídenos una cita por skype!

story:
Growler Haus community

Fountain Inn, you've proved to us that you want to see a Growler Haus in your community. When we stopped by for St. Patrick's Day, we raised over $1000! Spread the word and help be a vital part of bringing the best craft beer to Downtown Fountain Inn! We want to be around to celebrate all holidays with the Fountain Inn Growler Haus tribe, not just St. Patrick's Day! Check out the article from our first visit here and we can't wait to come back soon!

Growler Haus Community

Growler Haus was created to deliver the freshest craft beer while creating an environment that is conducive to business and social engagement of all types. Our unique environment is found is both the place and people of Growler Haus. 

The environment is specifically and thoughtfully designed to be a rustic, unpretentious pub style atmosphere with focus for the downtown business community. We refer to the Growler Haus as the “3rd environment,” which is not your work environment, not quite home, but rather a comfortable place to transition between the two. Beyond the space, it is the Growler Haus craft beer people in form of a dedicated customer base, honorably known as the “tribe,” that makes the Growler Haus competitively unique to all other beer locations.

The early and frequent successes of the company comes from delivering a unique craft beer buying experience, complete with multiple seasonal and tasteful craft/micro beers and other non-liquor libations including local wine and popular hard ciders. Grocery stores and big box retailers do not provide a unique experience to discuss and enjoy craft beer within a community setting (e.g., a StarbucksTM social environment for the craft beer enthusiast); however, purchasing craft and micro beer in draft form in a growler each customer experiences the freshest way to consume their favorite beer.

Growler Haus is an entirely unique craft beer environment finding more in common with the proven Starbucks™ model than with its competitors in the craft beer market.  To summarize we consider Our unique competitive advantages to be:

Our Tribe.  Growler Haus works hard, even before a craft beer location is opened, to build a dedicated tribe of individuals who feel and share a type of ownership in the space and success of Growler Haus. It is this “tribe” that becomes integral to the early and sustaining success of Growler Haus and its unique market offering. As an energetic and community-minded coalition, our tribe is often a mix of seasoned professionals including corporate managers, medical doctors, academic professors, artists and entrepreneurs. Growler Haus will put its tribe up against any other customer base or affinity group in craft beer today. 

Our Ecosystem. Growler Haus does host events for football games, special holidays, and trivia nights. However, it goes one step beyond by forming and supporting an entire ecosystem of unique groups for its customers to join including: (i) Grain Ideas - new local business ideas; (ii) Frothy Fellowship/Pub Theology - honest discussions around topics of faith; (iii) Pints for the People - community supported activities; and (iv) Home Brew Crew – home brewers educating and demonstrating the art of home brewing.

Our Locations.  Growler Haus is focused on pioneering craft beer environments into emerging South Carolina cities by capturing the momentum of young and middle age professionals hungry for a community-gathering place. By partnering with the local economic development, education and art community officials interested in re-energizing and growing their downtown areas, Growler Haus can be a first mover and define the local craft beer marketplace.

[1] Language inspired by Seth Godin’s work on “Tribes.”

Growler Haus Fountain Inn team wants YOU!

Growler Haus Fountain Inn team desires to gather 200+ local craft beer tribe members before we open the summer of 2015 in downtown Fountain Inn. The early tribe members are instrumental to our success and will be a part of a local craft beer family second to none. As a participating Growler Haus crowd funding tribe member through this page and awards, you will gain access to Growler Haus branded items, be a part of a growing community before anyone else as well as be invited to a sneak peek of the Growler Haus transformation and private party prior to opening to the public.

The Impact

The Growler Haus Fountain Inn team is seeking $10,000 from the local craft beer community that wants to be a part of something special that has been delivered in other neighboring communities in Anderson and Spartanburg, SC. We would love for you to visit one of the existing locations and get a sense for the business community, relaxed environment, great camaraderie and excellent craft beer experience.

Join the Growler Haus tribe in delivering the best craft beer in downtown Fountain Inn.

story:
About the Studio

Darkside Fitness will be a holistic fitness studio in Oceanside, CA that offers innovative fitness classes such as pole fitness, yoga, aerial silks, calisthenics, partner yoga, and personal training.

Pole and yoga studios aren’t just fitness studios - they create communities of like-minded people who share passion for something they love.  Members develop lifelong bonds and help each other to grow emotionally and physically.   By contributing to funding for Darkside Fitness, you will be helping to improve the lives of many by creating a space that is supportive, safe, and fun.

 

About the Owner

My name is Andrea - I also go by Dre Dee.  My passion in life has always been helping others.  I have been an occupational therapist since 2006 and have had the opportunity to help hundreds of people with a variety of different disabilities, injuries, and illnesses to be as independent with daily living as possible.  I have a Masters Degree in Health Sciences and I have extensive training in anatomy, neurology, and psychology.  I am also a registered yoga instructor, certified group fitness instructor,  and a certified personal trainer.  I enjoy accomodating all levels of fitness and use a variety of therapeutic techniques I have learned over the years in my classes to help heal and prevent injuries.

I discovered pole dancing in 2010 from a Groupon for a class at my local pole studio.  Although I have never worked as an exotic dancer, I appreciate pole as a sensual form of art and enjoy empowering women and men through fitness and dance.  I began performing in 2012, teaching pole and yoga in 2013, and competing in 2014.  I believe in a holistic approach to fitness and incorporate a combination of strength, flexibility, and cardiovascular training into my fitness classes.  I currently teach pole and fitness classes at a local studio as well as teaching private and group yoga and pole lessons in my home.  

Although I have had a great career for 9 years, I have faced quite a few financial pitfalls in the last few years that have made it difficult for me to have funding to start this project.  I have always been a hard worker and have never given up or asked for help through any of my struggles, but I am asking you for a little support now to help pursue my dream which I feel will help change the lives of many.


Start Up Funding 

Your help is needed to help purchase equipment for the studio such as fitness poles, aerial equipment (lyras, silks, suspension equipment), office equipment (computer and printer), yoga equipment (mats, bolsters, towels, etc), and calisthenics training equipment.   Cost of equipment and materials is estimated to be $15,000.  Cost of tenant improvements that will be needed for the space such as laminate flooring, lighting fixtures, signage, heat installation, and other costs is $30,000.  I am requesting $15,000 to help with the cost, the rest is coming out of my own pocket.  Any and all money contributed will go towards the costs of opening the studio.  You can help contribute to the studio by purchasing one of the perks.  All donations are greatly appreciated - large or small!  And if you can't donate, please help by sharing this link!   Thank you for your support!

http://igg.me/at/darksidefitness 

Andrea

story:
Our Mission 

At Helping Heroes Inc. we are committed to helping the brave men and women who have served our country. It is our mission to raise awareness and secure funds that can be used to assist heroes in overcoming homelessness, securing jobs, and obtaining treatment for addiction and trauma. We are committed to serving our veterans with respect, honor, compassion, and integrity. For those who have served us, we now proudly serve them.

Donate today to help our Veterans

* 12%  of the homeless population are Veterans

* 1,400,000 Veterans are at risk of becoming homeless

* 49,933 The number of Veterans that are homeless on any given night

* 18 Average of how many Veterans commit suicide everyday

* 9% Homeless Veterans between the ages of 18-30

*41% Homeless Veterans between the ages of 31-50

*50% Served in Vietnam

*66% Served for at least 3 years

*33% Were stationed in War Zones

* 12,700 Veterans of Operation Enduring Freedom (OEF), Operation Iraqi Freedom (OIF) and Operation New Dawn (OND) were homeless in 2010

The numbers are staggering!


Why should Men and Women that sacrificed so much for our country be out on the streets, fighting once again. This time the fight is much different, they're fighting to stay alive in the very country that they once fought so fercily to protect. They're looked down on as bums, drunks. They hear people yelling at them to just go get a job. Our Veterans deserve much more than this!

Thank you for your Donation!

Photo taken by JM Suarez Homeless Veteran in New York


 


They need your HELP!!!!

  The VA states that the best program to help homeless Veterans is a very structured community based program. Which allows them to have a purpose. That’s exactly what we’re trying to set up. A year long program for 10-15 Veterans at a time, during which they can get the help they need, whether it be medically or psychologically. At the end of the program we’ll help them get fully set up in an apartment or home of their own, as well continued help throughout their life with job placement.

  What else do they need? A service animal that fits their unique personality. During the program they’ll have the opportunity to train a dog that fits them. A lifelong partner that can give them the unconditional love they deserve. They will also be able to work with animals throughout the program while establishing our doggy daycare and rescue center.

  At the end of the program they will be back on their feet with the support they so desperately need!!! Your Donations make this possible!

What we need from you!

  Mid-August we’re holding a 5K walk/run to show our support in Melbourne Fl, at Whickham Park. We need you there!!!!! Whether you can walk, run, or wheel your way through the race we want you there! Click on the perk to the right of your screen and secure your spot!!! Show your Support! After you click on one of the perks, we need to you share this page on Facebook, twitter, anywhere and with everyone, HELP get the awareness out for these brave Veterans that have sacrificed so much already!!!

  At the race we will also be holding a raffle, you do not have to be present to win. Buy one of the bracelets to show your support where ever you go! All the bracelets are handmade to last a lifetime.

Don’t waste any more time show your support pick a perk and Donate today!!!!


The funds raised will be used to fund the start up costs associated with filing for tax exempt status, we are already legally formed as a Non Profit Corporation based in the state of Florida, You can find our filings on Sunbiz.org Helping Heroes Inc, further fundraising activities.  As well as finishing the documentary regarding the struggles that Veterans endure as they are transitioning into civilian life.  Currently we already have two stories filmed for principle production and four more on the schedule to be filmed by end of April. Production is being filmed by Black Triad Entertainment Group, they're a multi award winning production company based in South Florida with strong ties to the community as well as the entertainment industry. Upon completion we also have interest for the documentary from distributors, but first we need to finish the principle filming. Proceeds from distribution will go towards funding  Helping Heroes Inc. retrofit a building in South Florida to help homeless Vets get reestablished and back on their feet.  Show your support and donate today.

1st Year Goal: Purchase an apartment building or multiple foreclosed houses that we may retrofit in order to house 10-15 homeless Veterans and get them on the path to once again hold their head high. This will be located on the Treasure Coast of Florida. The total cost is $100,000. We already have multiple contractors and laborers who have volunteered to give their time and/or materials to the project.

2nd Year Goa:l Have our Dog Daycare and Rescue established, giving out 10 service dogs a year to Veterans not living in our housing as well as another 10-15 service dogs in our program. Service dog training centers, would serve to train stray dogs to assist Veterans who suffer from hearing loss, vision loss, and those suffering from PTSD.


3rd year Goal: Grand Opening of our Liquidation center where the public is able to buy brand new furniture, clothing, housewares, shoes, toys, and other household items below retail prices. All profits from the liquidation center will further support Helping Heroes Inc. to allow us to house more Veterans.  When the Veterans graduate the program they will also get their pick of furniture etc… to set up their own place. This is also where Veterans who have graduated the program will work until they find permanent work else where.


4th Year Goal: Non Profit Expansion. Helping Heroes plans to partner with individuals in other areas of the country to further our mission throughout the United States

I'd like you to meet Seargant John Baughman USMC. He served 12 Years for our country.  John Joined the Marines pre 9/11 and was first boots on the ground in Iraq in 2003. John is a die hard Eagles fan, (we won't hold that against him we all have our faults) He is also leaving us here in sunny Florida and heading to Minneapolis for college, Majoring in Sports Broadcasting and Broadcasting. We wish him the best of luck with all of his future ventures. He has an amazing spirit, and story of the struggle with PTSD and how he overcame that struggle and the progams that worked best for him. I'm proud not only to have him agree to be in our Documentary but to also call him my Friend. Teaser reel of his story will be added here soon, so come back to see some of his struggle, his triumphs, and his advice to all other Veterans. One statement he he made during filming that truly shows his love for this country, and the USMC we asked him "if you could go back and change anything what would you change?" John replied "Absolutely nothing, I've loved every second of it"

Help Us, So We can Help Men and Women like John who have served our country with pride and dignity, and sometimes need a little help, Donate today to help people like Seargant John Baughman

One statement he he made during filming that truly shows his love for this country, and the USMC we asked him "if you could go back and change anything what would you change?" John replied "Absolutely nothing, I've loved every second of it"

Help Us, So We can Help Men and Women like John who have served our country with pride and dignity, and sometimes need a little help, Donate today to help people like Seargant John Baughman

story:
What is iGEM?

iGEM (International Genetically Engineered Machines) is the largest annual international research competition in synthetic biology. Teams design novel biological solutions to real world problems by engineering genetic information to give an organism a new ability. Teams from universities worldwide then submit their solutions to iGEM as Biobricks, standardized biological parts, so they are available to other researchers. The competition culminates at the World Jamboree held in Boston, Massachusetts every autumn, where students have the opportunity to present their work.


Meet the Teams

Georgia State University

This is the 5th year that the Synthetic Biology Club at Georgia State is participating in the competition. Previous projects include standardization of vectors for expression in Pichia Pastoris and expression of mambalgin, a protein with potential analgesic properties. Outside of labwork, the GSU iGEM team strives to be ambassadors for science by educating the public about the power of using synthetic biology in real world solutions as well as the ethical and safety issues in the field.


Georgia Institute of Technology
Our team is composed of young and experienced students, passionate and ready to take on projects that have massive implications. In previous years, we have explored ways to alleviate the environmental damage cause by fracking and developed tools to engineer the next generation of biosensors. We look forward to  meeting other teams and forging new collaborations during this competition season.


Why We Need Your Help

Because our iGEM teams are independent student organization, we rely heavily on donations to support our training, research and outreach. Last year, it cost each team around $25,000 to attend the World Jamboree in Boston. This included flights, hotels, and Jamboree registration for 10 students. The Jamboree affords students a great opportunity to gain presentation experience and network with other students from around the world and with various biotechnology companies. For many students, iGEM is the first scientific conference that they experience, and it provides them with invaluable insight into professional careers in science.

Your support will not only provide us with lab supplies essential to our projects, but will also ensure that travel opportunities are extended to all students who work on our projects.

Other Ways You Can Help

GSU Follow us on Facebook and Twitter!

GT Follow us on Facebook!

story:
For more than 20 years I have been in the Hollywood game. And there is one thing that I know for certain. People want to work with people that they trust. And in my 20 plus years in Hollywood I have helped a great many people get their start to a successful career in television and feature films. Through each experience there is one quality that has consistently been my trademark; I do what I say I am going to do and that you can trust.        



     

My new brand, The Addison Witt Group involves my expert friends this time. In today's economic market groups of people work together. No longer is there just one person saying it’s all about me and I got here by myself. It takes a village to get where you want to go in life. And we all have a desire to work with people that we trust as we create more opportunities for ourselves and others. The Addison Witt Group can help a lot more people achieve their entertainment goals through consultations, through marketing tools, and through our online outreach. We are raising money to aide us with this business model. 


We already receive countless email from people that are seeking our help in the pursuit of their dreams. Wow! That truly is very big: To help someone pursue their dreams. You do it as well. You put people in touch with each other when you believe it will help them out. Why? Because you care.

Every week I either hear from a parent that is interested in helping their child get discovered, or a person that went into the work force and couldn't pursue their dreams until much later in life. I hear from young actors, singers, and models that are ready to make the leap to Hollywood but don't know where or how to begin. 

With your help The Addison Witt Group will help a lot more people achieve success and live life on a big stage while sharing their talent and humanity with the world.  

The money we raise here will help us (1) advertise via social media, (2) self-publish our self-propelling workbook, and (3) create my new app idea that will reach even more people. 

Background

In 1994 I thought of an idea I named "How to Live and Survive in Hollywood." That idea became a production video that took me around the city of Los Angeles filming actors and local landmarks so that one, I could better understand the pursuit of an entertainers career path in Hollywood. And two, I could lead others to a winning career strategy. Then an extraordinary awareness began to grow within me. The very idea became a concept that materialized into my reality. Before I knew it, I was living what I had in essence created on paper. The very words that I had spoken in my video I began to share with others. This led to teaching and managing talent. 

Six years later in 2000 I launched WEM, Inc., a Talent Management company known for starting the careers of several noted television and film actors that have been recognized and awarded by Emmy, BAFTA, GOYA, TV Critics (TCA), People's Choice, SAG, Golden Globe, Media Access, and other prestigious organizations around the world. My idea had led to the manifestation of real achievements recognized by academies and millions of people around the world. 

         

In fact I have cultivated some pretty interesting career paths for a bevy of actors including RJ Mitte from the Emmy winning series,"Breaking Bad." You can even find the youtube video online where I coached RJ Mitte for the life changing event in his life. The video is called Creating Celebrity. RJ is known for having the disability Cerebral Palsy  He uses this gift as his platform to spread his message of equality around the world. I set up that opportunity for RJ.  And he and I broke barriers in television, demonstrating that the 50 million Americans with disabilities can have just as much of an impact in media as non-disabled people. 


                  

Leah Pipes was my first breakout talent and she is best known for her work on the "The Originals," a WB spinoff vampire series. Leah has worked non-stop since I started her out at age of 12 years old. Before Sierra McCormick became a regular on "Ant Farm," she was voted the number one villain on TV as Lilith in "Supernatural." I coached Sierra McCormick for that role. I took her natural ability and shaped it into a marketing sensation. And before Nikki SooHoo was ever so lovely in "The Lovely Bones" she was "sticking it" on a gymnast mat in Disney's "Stick It," and learning to play the guitar from Oscar winning actor, Jeff Bridges on set. These actors all had big dreams. And along with their parents they entrusted me to help turn those dreams into reality. 

All of this has been awesome. Now it is time for The Addison Witt Group to expand and help a lot more people. Here is what we do: 

  1. Offer our guidance and expertise by consulting with people around the globe through http://www.theaddisonwittgroup.com website. 
  2. Travel to groups around the world as teachers. 
  3. Educate people through our website and goal-oriented work books. This is the beginning.

     

As we grow we will become even more dynamic and offer additional ways to expand.  And you can be a part of our momentum by contributing to our campaign. 

And for that I say Thank You.
